name: Cottage in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted byÂ Danielle4 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2020**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Located somewhere between a soft summer breeze and an afternoon siesta in the hammock.  The Coconut Cottage is a place where only the best memories are made! Built in the 1930's, it has all the cute charm of simpler times combined with the convenience of modern amenities.  The cottage is just perfect for family, friends, or even solo travelers looking for a beautiful place to stay that's close to everything!  The property is 5 minutes to downtown and 20 minutes to the beach (traffic dependent).The spaceComing in at around 400 square feet, this pleasantly-old-fashioned space has a cozy warmth with an eclectic touch.  The cottage is in a little Caribbean inspired complex adoringly named The Wanderlust Cottages.  You'll love it for a romantic getaway, a sweet vacation with someone special, or your family vacation.  Please note: the space is quaint.  The bedrooms are adjoining, and the bathroom is accessed through the master bedroom.    We wanted to keep the place open and airy despite its modest size.  P.S: You may occasionally hear the rumble and catch a glimpse of Americas most coveted flying force: The Blue Angels! Pardon the noise it's the sound of Freedom!

more description: Enjoy your stay in Pensacola at Parrot House Nest!Newly built this studio unit is stylishly decorated with a small but full kitchen, a beautiful tile shower, and it's own private entrance and outdoor area.Stay Parrot House is Pensacola owned and operated, we specialize in fully stocked homes that provide a truly comfortable and complete experience.This home is a duplex, though no walls are shared, the laundry facilities are used by both units.The spaceParrot House III is close to NAS and Corry Station.This unit is a lovely and cozy studio unit with a full kitchen. This home features a medium firm King bed.This home is an un-attached Duplex: There is another unit on the property that does not share walls, but is adjacent to this house, and that you share the laundry room with. You have your own private parking, and private backyard area. ________________________PRICINGNightly rate: $69-109 depending on season etc.Pet fee: $30 up to 1 pet (please review pet policy below)Cleaning fee: $60 paid directly to independent cleaning crewIn addition there's an airbnb fee and hospitality taxes that contribute to your total reservation cost.  ____________________DISCOUNTS:Discounts can be combined to equal up to 20% off nightly rate.WEEKLY DISCOUNT: We offer a 10% weekly discount!MILITARY DISCOUNT:10% off base nightly rate- After booking send a picture of your military ID and we will issue a 10% refund._____________________Location:1.3 miles to NAS3 miles to DT23 min to Pcola Beach17 min to Perdido KeyPETS:We are Pet Friendly!We allow 1 pet in this unit with a pet fee of $30. We are happy to consider additional pets, just ask!Your pet needs to be well behaved, and able to play well with others as there is another unit on this property. This unit does have it's own outside area however. The pet fee is for interior cleaning, and you will need to pick up any presents your pet deposits in the yard!Thanks :)

more description: Our brand new, custom built airbnb is in beautiful East Hill. Our place is centrally located just minutes from PNS airport, downtown restaurants and bars, and Pensacola Beach! It is also just a short walk to Bayou Texar and Bayview park. The guest suite is a completely private space with driveway parking for 2 cars and your own patio area! Enjoy beautiful views of the Bayou from the dining room table or the patio area. We'll do anything we can to make your stay great!The spaceThe place was specifically designed and built to be an Airbnb. The place is only 425 square feet but has everything you need for an amazing Pensacola vacation.  The bedroom has a queen bed and 50 inch tv. The living / dining room has high top table that sits 4 people and a sofa that pulls out into a second queen bed.  The kitchen includes a refrigerator, freezer, sink, coffee station, microwave and built in cook top.  The bathroom has tile floors, custom vanity and walk-in shower.

more description: **Starting Nov 1, 2022 this unit will sleep 2 people only.1 bed, 1 bath water view condo located on Little Sabine Bay in Pensacola Beach, FL. Relax on the patio as you look out at the tranquil water with the salty breeze blowing in your hair. The beautiful white sandy beaches of the Gulf of Mexico are right across the street with the nearest public access less than a 5 minute walk away! You can also easily walk/drive to the bustling boardwalk with shopping and plenty of great restaurants.The space**Starting Nov 1, 2022 this unit will sleep 2 people only on the king bed in the bedroom. The sofa bed will no longer be available.Rest on the new comfy queen bed in the bedroom, or the memory foam sofa bed in the living room. Smart TVs in the living room and bedroom feature basic cable and is loaded with streaming apps like Netflix and Hulu so you can use your own login. WiFi available! Full kitchen with stove, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, and coffee maker along with all the essential tools you need to make a delicious meal. There is a desk in the bedroom if you need to work while hanging out in paradise. There is a compact washer/dryer in the closet on the patio for laundering your beachwear.

description: Eclectic Eco- Friendly Luxe City Cottage
name: Cottage in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted byÂ Rory3 guests Â·  Â· 1 bedroom Â·  Â· 1 bed Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 3 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bedroom Â· **__** Â· 1 bed Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2015**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: New eco chic cottage features high end touches and appliances in a cozy luxe setting. Sitting on the edge of the downtown jurisdiction, you're never too far away from the action on Palafox Street and a quick jaunt over to the beach. A chlorinated, salt water â€œstock tank poolâ€ awaits you in the back for a quick dip to cool off or relax. Excellent access to Wahoos Stadium, Sanders Beach, The Oar House, Pensacola Yacht Club, Pensacola Country Club, Joe Patti's, and Pensacola's Naval Air Station.The spaceThis cottage welcomes you with a quaint covered porch, perfect for enjoying a brief afternoon rainstorm. As you enter the home you're greeted with a spacious entertaining area equipped with a fully stocked kitchen. Large ceilings and high end touches make this "tiny home" present a big impression. As you continue in the home, the hallway to the rear living area includes a utility closet with a full size washer and dryer, as well as access to the bathroom. The master bedroom features a California King size bed and 40" Smart TV. The bedroom also offers a second entrance to the bathroom, which features a large walk in shower with temperature gauge faucet. Last, but not least, the backyard offers an incredible space to sit out and enjoy a cocktail while you relax in the â€œstock tank poolâ€ or grill on the provided electric grill. Tall trees, a small green space, and hanging lights keep the space enjoyable and usable well into the later hours. The central air conditioning and heat are easy to control and is ultra silent. The front entertaining area offers a couch and plush corner chair for seating and also features a 50" Smart TV. This home features internet access with WiFi as well as cable TV, including Showtime. Two beach style cruiser bicycles are also included with the rental of this home, they are provided free of cost with all safety equipment included.

more description: Please read our great reviews! Whether youâ€™re visiting Pensacola for business or pleasure, thank you for your interest in our guest house. Weâ€™re located in the heart of East Hill, which is a very charming and established neighborhood. The area is peaceful and quiet, yet only about a 5-10 minute drive downtown Pensacola. We will do everything we can to make your stay great! The house includes driveway parking and your own private fenced in yard.The spaceOur guesthouse is clean with design revolving around a tropical and modern theme. The space is around 220 sqft. While not large, the space is wide open and feels much bigger. The bed is a very comfy queen. As you'll see in the pictures, there is a large kitchen area that can handle any cooking you'll be doing. There's a fold out table under the TV with two stools that can comfortably seat two people. Outside, there is a great private seating area  under the tree.

number of guests: 2 guests Â· **__** Â· Studio Â· **__** Â· 1 bed Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in January 2016**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: This cozy guest cottage has shiplap walls and a very warm and inviting interior. It's perfect for a quiet getaway for 1 or 2 people. Located in Pensacola's eclectic East Hill neighborhood it is close to downtown, restaurants and local shops. The home is best suited for guests over the age of 18 and is not equipped for small children or infants. Please note that Jasper (my cat) is very friendly and likes to visit!  Also - no smoking is allowed inside the cottage.The spaceThe shiplap walls and cozy decor make this a great little hideaway.  There is a train that runs a few times a day and there may be construction in the neighborhood.  So if you are a light or late sleeper, I have provided earplugs.Also - please note that I have a 12 year old cat (Jasper) who is very friendly and likes to visit guests, watch TV and make himself at home.  If you have allergies, this may not be the best place for you.  In addition, I have a sweet dachshund (Piper) who stays in the main house with me - she may scamper into the backyard to play, so please keep the metal gate secured.

description: Orange Tree Cottage: Entire House, Cute & Charming
name: Cottage in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted byÂ Susan5 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2017**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Orange Tree Cottage is your home away from home, a cozy place to unwind and relax within 40 minutes of gorgeous sugar-sand beaches. Located in the center of greater Pensacola, you're a short drive from wherever you need to be: the night life of downtown Palafox, wonders of the Naval Aviation Museum at Pensacola NAS, or visiting family and friends. This clean, pristine private house feels fresh and vital, with plenty of lounging space, full kitchen, bonus room, and rustic (non-fenced) backyard.The spaceQuaint 1960s hideaway in established neighborhood, with fresh and clean updates. New paint and flooring, gentle colors, contemporary dÃ©cor, and thoughtful touches. Coffee bar, iron & ironing board, full laundry, everything you need in the kitchen, bonus room where the kids can play or watch tv. The bedrooms feature cozy beds, luggage racks, plus plenty of space in the closet or dresser for clothing. The master bedroom has a tv, each side of both rooms' beds have plugs within easy reach, and the wifi signal is strong throughout the house. The backyard is open and a bit overgrown, but that's just more fun for the kids. It's a quiet street, but also within earshot of the railroad tracks so you can hear the train horn at times. There is a security camera at the front door for extra peace of mind. You're free to arrive at anytime with keypad entry. You're welcome to store bikes or kayaks in the (unsecured) back shed, or you can bring clean(ish) bicycles into the laundry room.

description: Salty Dog Cottage! Downtown Beach Vibes, Pensacola
name: Cottage in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted by Stephanie AndÂ Freddy4 guests Â·  Â· 1 bedroom Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 4 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bedroom Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2022**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Salty Dog Cottage, where the ocean breeze meets the lively downtown streets! Modern amenities meet coastal charm in this shotgun bungalow, built in 1901. What's with the name?! Our sweet pup, Penny Lane, absolutely LOVED putting her paws in the sand and frolicking in the salty waves of the ocean. Penny remains with us in spirit & Salty Dog is a tribute to  her love for the sun, salt & sand. We hope you'll enjoy your stay on the Emerald Coast at Salty Dog Cottage. P'cola welcomes you!The spaceEnjoy a completely private, beautifully designed home for your stay in Pensacola. Salty Dog Cottage has been lovingly restored & thoughtfully designed to embrace the character of a 1901 home while offering modern amenities. You'll enjoy 570 sq ft of light & airy sun-filled space, soaring ceilings, a cozy living room with a convertible sofa bed, bedroom w/ king size green tea mattress, organic toiletries & full sized washer & dryer. While there is plentiful natural light, both the bedroom & living room have room darkening fabric lined curtains for mornings you may want to sleep-in. For cozy nights in, cook a fresh meal in the open concept kitchen. Feel free to cut sprigs of fresh rosemary from the front garden to garnish your meal (or cocktail). For a low-key stay-at-home night, kick back on your sofa for a night of Netflix on your Roku TV. Coming back from the beach, have an invigorating rinse in your outdoor shower that boasts hot AND cold water! Relax outdoors on the quaint front porch in your adirondack chairs or enjoy al fresco dining out back. Convenient keyless entry via the smart lock makes self check-in a breeze. Play Pandora or pair your phone to the Alexa speaker to listen to some tunes. Video doorbells in both the front exterior and rear exterior of the property offer home video/audio monitoring. Salty Dog Cottage is your home away from home & we hope you enjoy your stay!

more description: All new 2018, quiet, beautiful, relaxing  guesthouse (formerly Whitneyâ€™s ironwork studio).   Private entrance. In historic East Hill, surrounded by peaceful, towering oak and pecan trees. The French doors provide lots of natural light and an open, airy feeling.  Private patio.  Quiet, historic neighborhood -- perfect for walks or bike rides. Only 1.2 miles from downtown.  Within a few blocks are breakfast/coffee shops, restaurants, Publix Grocery, pubs. Easy 15 minute drive to the beach.The spaceLocated next to our restored  1920â€™s home, our comfy guesthouse has a private entrance.  An easy walk to several restaurants, and Publix grocery. New queen bed, a pullout sofa, and blackout curtains.  There is a full kitchen, private bathroom, and closet.  You will enjoy lots of Whitneyâ€™s artistic touches, like the 19th century barnwood table that she built. Open floor plan.  Super close to downtown (easy 5 minute easy bike ride).  Just 10 minutes from the airport. Includes, grill, and beach towels.  The private patio is perfect for morning coffee, or afternoon wine :)

more description: WELCOME TO PARROT HOUSEThis adorable 2 bed 1 bath home is FULLY STOCKED- you will not need to bring anything other than food & beverages. It's also cleaned by licensed professionals :)It features brand new HVAC, tons of creature comforts, and affordable fall pricing- 10% Military discount applies. In addition to a spacious living room, there is a separate dining area for family meals or game night!Please scroll down to see all of the included amenities.The spaceParrot House III is close to NAS and Corry Station.This adorable and spacious 2 bed 1 bath features a separate dining area and carport!It has been fully updated with central HVAC system, washer/dryer, dishwasher and more. This home is an un-attached Duplex: There is another unit on the property that does not share walls, but is adjacent to this house, and that you share the laundry room with. You have your own private parking, and private backyard area. Bed 1: King BedBed 2: 2- XL Twin beds1 full bathroom with tubTotal Square feet: 900Fully fenced backyardPartially fenced front yardCarport parking for 1 carDriveway parking for up to 2 additional vehicles, plus free street parkingShared Washer and Dryer, free of charge________________________PRICINGNightly rate: $89-$169 depending on season etc.Pet fee: $50 up to 2 pets (please review pet policy under rules)Cleaning fee: $95, paid directly to the cleaning crewIn addition there's an airbnb fee and hospitality taxes that contribute to your total reservation cost.  ____________________DISCOUNTS:Discounts can be combined to equal up to 20% off nightly rate.WEEKLY DISCOUNT: We offer a 10% weekly discount!MILITARY DISCOUNT:10% off base nightly rate- After booking send a picture of your military ID and we will issue a 10% refund._____________________Location:1.3 miles to NAS3 miles to DT23 min to Pcola Beach17 min to Perdido KeyPETS:We are Pet Friendly!We allow 2 pets in this unit with a pet fee of $50. We are happy to consider additional pets, just ask!Your pet needs to be well behaved, and able to play well with others as there is another unit on this property. This unit does have it's own outside area however. The pet fee is for interior cleaning, and you will need to pick up any presents your pet deposits in the yard!Thanks :)MOTHER NATUE: Regular Pest control is performed on the property, however this is Florida and during some times of years an occasional bug or 2 may find it's way inside.

more description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit! There's plenty of on site parking be it multiple cars/trailer! P-cola Beach is a quick 5 min drive to access the 110-S that will lead you to our white sandy beaches in 15-20 mins! Airport is about 10 mins to the east, Cordova Mall, restaurants, bowling alley, & movie theater all about 5 mins east, & downtown about 10-15 mins South where there's plenty more to experience here in our beautiful home of Pensacola! WELCOME!The spaceThis space is newly renovated a provides a studio style all in one bedroom, living area, a small kitchenette, washer/dryer in unit! Perfect for a couple or 3 guest- if one doesnt mind sleeping on a smaller couch or bringing your own air mattress! Full bathroom with stand up shower. Plenty of parking and a private entrance through the back door of the main house. No access between the main house and this renovated attached mother-in-law suite! Private, Fenced in yard with an uncovered table and 2 chairs (byob bug spray the mosquitos can get wild anywhere here in florida)

more description: Treat yourself to this newly renovated 2Bd/1Ba house in the Historic East Hill Neighborhood. Just 5 minutes from Downtown, 10 minutes from the airport, and 15 minutes from the beach, this centrally located home is close to the action, without the commotion. Whether you are a family, a group of friends, or a remote worker, our home offers you everything you need for your next trip.The spaceNewly renovated, this home offers a relaxing experience in a stylish manner. The home features two bedrooms with ample sleeping space, an updated bathroom, a dining room and a fully equipped kitchen. Enjoy the evening on the outdoor patio gathered around the firepit or if you choose, spend a cozy evening in front of the indoor fireplace . With Smart TVs in every room, a foosball table, and plenty of nearby dining ,you will always be entertained. After a long day, unwind in front of the indoor fireplace

more description: Orange You Glad You Found This Place? Steps from Bayview Park including small and large dog parks, dog beach, tennis courts, workout area, boat ramp,  Bayview Center & more. 5 minutes to downtown, 15 minutes to Pensacola Beach or have some fun and rent our bikes for $15 a day per bike. While attached to the main house, the guest suite is its own private space, with a separate entrance, temperature control, driveway parking for 2 and room for a 40â€™ boat. Weâ€™ll do anything to make your stay great!The spaceThe Orange Bayview is a newly renovated suite with a comfy full sized bed, AC unit, a stylish kitchenette with convection oven, induction stove top, brand new Whirlpool dishwasher, retro refrigerator/freezer and microwave, a spacious bathroom with shower (tankless water heater so you will never run out of hot water!), Kenmore washer and dryer, smart TV and ceiling fan. We are pet friendly! The pet fee is a one time fee of $50 per pet. We have a weight limit of 30 pounds per dog, max two dogs, but if this is not your situation please send me a message and we can discuss options.  We are infant friendly and provide a pack and play, baby bather, and some utensils/plates/cups.   Children are welcome and a fold out cot or air mattress will be provided, but please note this is a suite and is best for max 2 people.

more description: Welcome to the Old East Hill Railroad House! This beautiful home was built in the late 1800s and was used to house the Pensacola Railroad workers. It has since been converted into separate apartment units. This unit is a studio apartment which includes a full sized day bed, a private bathroom, a mini fridge, microwave, coffee maker, WiFi, and Roku TV! You are just 5 blocks to the civic center, a 15 minute drive to the beach, and 3 minute drive to the heart of downtown.The spaceThe property consists of multiple units and is used for both long term and short term rentals. Your studio is located at the front of the house and is accessible from the front porch. This small, well appointed studio was inspired by a magical stay we had in London.  It is a cozy efficiency unit and provides two guests with all that is needed for a comfortable stay. If you prefer more space to spread out, Suite A is a better fit.

more description: **Starting Nov 1, 2022 this unit will sleep 2 people only.1 bed, 1 bath water view condo located on Little Sabine Bay in Pensacola Beach, FL. Relax on the patio as you look out at the tranquil water with the salty breeze blowing in your hair. The beautiful white sandy beaches of the Gulf of Mexico are right across the street with the nearest public access less than a 5 minute walk away! You can also easily walk/drive to the bustling boardwalk with shopping and plenty of great restaurants.The space**Starting Nov 1, 2022 this unit will sleep 2 people only on the king bed in the bedroom. The sofa bed will no longer be available.Rest on the new comfy queen bed in the bedroom, or the memory foam sofa bed in the living room. Smart TVs in the living room and bedroom feature basic cable and is loaded with streaming apps like Netflix and Hulu so you can use your own login. WiFi available! Full kitchen with stove, microwave, fridge, dishwasher, and coffee maker along with all the essential tools you need to make a delicious meal. There is a desk in the bedroom if you need to work while hanging out in paradise. There is a compact washer/dryer in the closet on the patio for laundering your beachwear.

more description: WELCOME TO PARROT HOUSEThis adorable 2 bed 1 bath home is FULLY STOCKED- you will not need to bring anything other than food & beverages. It's also cleaned by licensed professionals :)It features brand new HVAC, tons of creature comforts, and affordable fall pricing- 10% Military discount applies. In addition to a spacious living room, there is a separate dining area for family meals or game night!Please scroll down to see all of the included amenities.The spaceParrot House III is close to NAS and Corry Station.This adorable and spacious 2 bed 1 bath features a separate dining area and carport!It has been fully updated with central HVAC system, washer/dryer, dishwasher and more. This home is an un-attached Duplex: There is another unit on the property that does not share walls, but is adjacent to this house, and that you share the laundry room with. You have your own private parking, and private backyard area. Bed 1: King BedBed 2: 2- XL Twin beds1 full bathroom with tubTotal Square feet: 900Fully fenced backyardPartially fenced front yardCarport parking for 1 carDriveway parking for up to 2 additional vehicles, plus free street parkingShared Washer and Dryer, free of charge________________________PRICINGNightly rate: $89-$169 depending on season etc.Pet fee: $50 up to 2 pets (please review pet policy under rules)Cleaning fee: $95, paid directly to the cleaning crewIn addition there's an airbnb fee and hospitality taxes that contribute to your total reservation cost.  ____________________DISCOUNTS:Discounts can be combined to equal up to 20% off nightly rate.WEEKLY DISCOUNT: We offer a 10% weekly discount!MILITARY DISCOUNT:10% off base nightly rate- After booking send a picture of your military ID and we will issue a 10% refund._____________________Location:1.3 miles to NAS3 miles to DT23 min to Pcola Beach17 min to Perdido KeyPETS:We are Pet Friendly!We allow 2 pets in this unit with a pet fee of $50. more description: This beautiful, vintage one bedroom apartment in downtown Pensacola is the perfect place to spend the weekend (or longer). This cozy little apartment is part of a beautiful historic home and is surrounded by gardens, shared patios and is within walking distance to all the fun things downtown Pensacola has to offer. Not only is this flat the perfect home base for shopping, nightlife, restaurants, museums etc. but it's only 10 miles from Pensacola Beach!The spaceThis beautiful little flat (Apt. #4) is on the second floor of a historic home in downtown Pensacola and consists of one bedroom, full kitchen with sit up bar and a full bath.Smart TVs are provided. Guests must log into their own streaming services for viewing. TVs are set up in guest mode which facilitates easy log in and log out for guests.

more description: Come enjoy this spacious, relaxing, upstairs studio apartment. This above garage studio is connected to an amazing custom built home. The home sits nestled in a lot surrounded by beautiful trees. From the balcony take in the terraced backyard and quiet sounds of nature. This studio is right around the corner from UWF and is centrally located to West Florida Hospital, shopping, & restaurants. It is 30 minutes to beautiful Pensacola Beach and 20 minutes to Downtown Pensacola!The spaceThe open floor plan and large windows make this studio feel welcoming and relaxing. A full kitchen with everything you need to make delicious meals. The living room/bedroom space is spacious for reading or watching TV. The bathroom has a stand-up shower and cozy towels.

more description: Orange You Glad You Found This Place? Steps from Bayview Park including small and large dog parks, dog beach, tennis courts, workout area, boat ramp,  Bayview Center & more. 5 minutes to downtown, 15 minutes to Pensacola Beach or have some fun and rent our bikes for $15 a day per bike. While attached to the main house, the guest suite is its own private space, with a separate entrance, temperature control, driveway parking for 2 and room for a 40â€™ boat. Weâ€™ll do anything to make your stay great!The spaceThe Orange Bayview is a newly renovated suite with a comfy full sized bed, AC unit, a stylish kitchenette with convection oven, induction stove top, brand new Whirlpool dishwasher, retro refrigerator/freezer and microwave, a spacious bathroom with shower (tankless water heater so you will never run out of hot water!), Kenmore washer and dryer, smart TV and ceiling fan. We are pet friendly! The pet fee is a one time fee of $50 per pet. We have a weight limit of 30 pounds per dog, max two dogs, but if this is not your situation please send me a message and we can discuss options.  We are infant friendly and provide a pack and play, baby bather, and some utensils/plates/cups.   Children are welcome and a fold out cot or air mattress will be provided, but please note this is a suite and is best for max 2 people.

more description:
Located in a century-old Victorian home in the Historic North Hill District of Downtown Pensacola, this studio apartment is full of charm. With original hardwood flooring and plenty of amenities, our â€œHide-Awayâ€ is as cozy as it gets! We provide everything youâ€™ll need such as kitchen essentials, toiletries, linens and a private entrance in the back of this historic home. Take a walk over to bustling Downtown Pensacola for local favorites such as Jaco's Bayfront Bar & Grille or Coffee Cup Restaurant. No matter what time of year, Pensacola is always hosting events - we are dubbed the â€œFestival City of the Southâ€ after all. Youâ€™ll have easy access to I-110, Pensacola Beach and Naval Air Station. We provide everything youâ€™ll need such as kitchen essentials, toiletries, linens and a private entrance in the back of this historic home.The spaceYour private studio adjoins the rear of a 1890 Victorian Historic home.  The studio has it's own entrance, is well appointed, and has a full kitchen.  A queen-sized bed shares the dining and kitchen space with electric fireplace. You have a full-size bathroom with tub and shower. 

COVID PRECAUTIONS: No corner overlooked. We are following a strict protocol, based on CDC recommendations, wiping down every inch of the house - doorknobs, light switches and more, using EPA-verified products. We want your stay to be worry free!

more description:
Welcome to The Carriage House. Escape to this one-bedroom, one-bath getaway located minutes from Downtown Pensacola. The inground pool, patio, grill, and bikes make your stay worthwhile. A pull-out sofa bed is located in the living room, making this house comfortable for up to four guests.

The Carriage House is proudly managed by Hometown Properties of the Gulf Coast in Pensacola, FL - find us @RentPensacolaHomes.The spaceThe Property -
Primary Bedroom: Queen-Sized Bed with Smart TV for streaming;
Living Room: Pull-out Bed Sofa, 2-Recliners, SmartTV for streaming;
Kitchen: Refrigerator, Electric Stove, Dishwasher, Over-the-range Microwave, Toaster, Coffee Maker, and Blender;
Washer & Dryer

ADDITIONAL DETAILS
Two bicycles
Free High-speed wireless internet
Streaming TVs, remember to bring your personal logins to your favorite streaming services.
Linens & towels are provided. Please bring your own beach towels
Hairdryer available
Coffee: We provide a starter amount of coffee
A variety of small kitchen appliances, including a toaster and blender, plus pots and pans
Household essentials â€“ â€œstarter packâ€ of laundry detergent, dishwashing detergent, trash bags, paper towels, toilet paper, and travel-sized shampoo, conditioner, and soap per bathroom. (typically enough for a 2-night stay)

EXTRAS:
Olive Oil, Salt/Pepper, and a few spices
Baking Sheets, Mixing Bowls, Dinnerware
We do not provide beach equipment â€“ beach towels, beach chairs, cooler, beach umbrella - be sure to bring your own.

POLICIES:
A full list of our rules and regulations is contained in our Rental Agreement, which will be emailed to you for electronic signature after booking. *Your booking is not complete until the Rental Agreement has been signed. *

TRASH/SANITATION: Please take the trash and recycling to the cans at the curb for pick up on Tuesday mornings. Thank you for helping keep our property clean and sanitary for future guests.

more description: Emerald Isle Resort condominium right on gorgeous Pensacola Beach! 2 BR/ 2 Bath, sleeper sofa, sleeps 7, Beachfront, Newly Renovated! Umbrella/Beach service, Exercise room, 2 Private Pools and 1 hot tub, VIEWS, VIEWS, VIEWS! Family friendly, fully stocked, spotless, recently renovated, all of the extras you could ask for!The spaceNEW Owner! NEW paint, bedding / linens, kitchen & bath accessories! SPOTLESS! You will be blown away by the spectacular floor to ceiling window views of the Gulf of Mexico that greet you upon your arrival! Located in the vacation paradise of the Emerald Isle Resort, this immaculate and beautifully decorated 2 bedroom / 2 bathroom condo has all of the room and amenities you could ever want or need to relax and enjoy your vacation! Bright, beautiful, and impeccably adorned this condoâ€™s stunning Gulf Front location is also conveniently located a short walk away from the heart of Pensacola Beach's most fun and festive restaurants, bars, and shopping. This condo has recently been renovated and is ready for your stay! The master suite is equipped with a king bed, direct balcony access, and unobstructed views of the Gulf of Mexico as well as the beach and pool areas. Master bedroom has attached private ensuite with whirlpool tub. The second suite has a queen bed, twin trundle, and private bath. The living area also has a pull out sofa for additional sleeping.  The kitchen which overlooks the family room, the balcony and the Gulf of Mexico is beautifully upgraded and is fully equipped with all the tools to prepare and entertain from your home away from home at Pensacola Beach. Free WiFi and washer / dryer in condo.  Bonus: Front Row Seats Each Year To Watch The World Famous Blue Angels Airshow!

more description: New eco chic cottage features high end touches and appliances in a cozy luxe setting. Sitting on the edge of the downtown jurisdiction, you're never too far away from the action on Palafox Street and a quick jaunt over to the beach. A chlorinated, salt water â€œstock tank poolâ€ awaits you in the back for a quick dip to cool off or relax. Excellent access to Wahoos Stadium, Sanders Beach, The Oar House, Pensacola Yacht Club, Pensacola Country Club, Joe Patti's, and Pensacola's Naval Air Station.The spaceThis cottage welcomes you with a quaint covered porch, perfect for enjoying a brief afternoon rainstorm. As you enter the home you're greeted with a spacious entertaining area equipped with a fully stocked kitchen. Large ceilings and high end touches make this "tiny home" present a big impression. As you continue in the home, the hallway to the rear living area includes a utility closet with a full size washer and dryer, as well as access to the bathroom. The master bedroom features a California King size bed and 40" Smart TV. The bedroom also offers a second entrance to the bathroom, which features a large walk in shower with temperature gauge faucet. Last, but not least, the backyard offers an incredible space to sit out and enjoy a cocktail while you relax in the â€œstock tank poolâ€ or grill on the provided electric grill. Tall trees, a small green space, and hanging lights keep the space enjoyable and usable well into the later hours. The central air conditioning and heat are easy to control and is ultra silent. The front entertaining area offers a couch and plush corner chair for seating and also features a 50" Smart TV. This home features internet access with WiFi as well as cable TV, including Showtime. Two beach style cruiser bicycles are also included with the rental of this home, they are provided free of cost with all safety equipment included.

more description: Ask us about long stay discounts!This unique place has a style all it's own. Bohimian themed, filled with plenty of pillows and poufs, 5 miles from the beach, and perfect for a travel nurse, business professionals, or military stays with quick trips to the beach!The spaceThis beautiful and relaxing townhome in Gulf Breeze is perfect for exploring from Pensacola all the way to Navarre!We have rollaway beds to help comfortably accommodate up to 6 adults. It's a perfect location to have easy access to any and everything that is the Emerald Coast: parks, shopping, local seafood & of course the beach! This unit is brand new with stainless appliances with an easy breezy feel. Only 5 miles from Pensacola beach and if you want to really explore the coast line, you're 25 minutes from Navarre beach if you travel the other direction!This townhome is all on one level so access is simple with no stairs. Clean linens plus extra are available as well as any other amenities you can think of: electric tea kettle with herbal teas, coffee maker and starter coffee/decaf/sugar provided, a 42" television & free Wifi, starter shampoo/conditioner/bodywash and fresh towels are waiting for you in each bathroom. No smoking in the unit (if smoke odor is detected by our teams upon departure an additional $125 per night will be billed to you). Thank you in advance.No parties. Some phenomenal attractions close by are:Fort PickensGulf Breeze ZooNaval Aviation MuseumPensacola BeachShoreline ParkOpal BeachNaval Live Oaks Natures Preserve Gulf Breeze Splash ParkNavarre Beach

more description: Great place for couples or singles within just a few blocks of thriving downtown Pensacola. Only a short drive to  our famous sugar white beaches.This cottage is small, but the whole place is yours, and the two original rooms, which were built in 1940, have 9 1/2 foot ceilings with magnificent crown moldings.New flooring, paint, kitchen and bath upgrades have come together to make this cottage a jewel of style, comfort, and grace.The spaceIt's called "Crooked Cottage" because the floors in this 81 year old house are a little uneven. It's quaint and "old-timey", but the furnishings are beautiful, modern,  and comfortable.

more description: Living in Florida's most extensive historical neighborhood is truly magical and we have decided to make our carriage home available so that others can enjoy this beautiful area for themselves and create a wonderful vacation experience.The spaceThe carriage home is approx. 400 sq ft of living space and is positioned to the rear of the property  for a more private and secluded feeling. You have your own private access and will take the outside stairs to reach the home. The unit was designed for two adults to enjoy comfortably.  There's a queen size Murphy bed that can be stowed into the closet if you'd like more floor space during the day. And for guest with a small child, the couch also makes out into a twin bed. There's a full kitchen and bathroom as well as a large walk in closet with washer & dryer. The unit also has a 40 inch smart TV with Netflix provided!

more description: Exceptional East hill duplex cottage in a convenient neighborhood.  We love the big bedroom and natural sun light throughout the home. Enjoyably mixing modern conveniences and historic charm, cottage was built in 1918 and is close to downtown, restaurants, bars, shopping, NAS Pensacola , and 40 minutes from the Pensacola beach.The spaceWelcome to Blue  Cottage! Unique recently renovated one bedroom spacious sunny corner duplex cottage in East hill neighborhood. Blue Cottage features a queen bed, flat screen TV, fully equipped kitchen, wifi, fridge/freezer and coffee station. Cozy front porch and private parking.Our check in time is 4PM and check out is 10:00 AM. Please let us know if you would like to check in early or check out late and we will try to accommodate you. In the event that we can accommodate, we charge early check in/late checkout fee of $40.

more description: Take a step back in time in this cozy & clean 1930's charmer located in the historic Sanders Beach Neighborhood! Located just a couple of blocks from Bayou Chico, the home is nestled on a unique property along with 3 other adorable cottages.  Relax and unwind on the back patio after a beach day. Take a 5 minute stroll to The Oar House, walk to Sanders Beach, or drive 5 minutes to the heart of downtown P'cola! Enjoy the short drive to the beach in about 20 minutes (depending on traffic).The spaceThe space has an airy, bright, and cheerful vibe! The cottage is located in a little Caribbean inspired complex adoringly named "The Wanderlust Cottages."  The place has 2 bedrooms one of which  is semi-private meaning that it doesn't have a door, but it does have privacy curtains and is quite delightful!  There is 1 bathroom so it will be shared between you and your guests.  Please note that the entrance is accessed through the master bedroom.  The bathroom is en suite in the master bedroom.  This place is perfect for a romantic getaway or small families.  P.S: You may occasionally hear the rumble and catch a glimpse of Americas most coveted flying force: The Blue Angels! Pardon the noise it's the sound of Freedom!

description: ARCADENear all NavarreBeach Offers,2min from Beach
name: Condo in Navarre
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted byÂ Ashley6 guests Â·  Â· 1 bedroom Â·  Â· 5 beds Â·  Â· 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bedroom Â· **__** Â· 5 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in January 2021**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Located on the second floor of the Gulf Island Condominiums Unit 523. Beautiful views of palms from the balcony. 2 min walk to the beach, 5 min walk to the home of the longest fishing pier in Florida at 1,545 ft. and access to many local bars and Restaurants. NICE POOL!The spaceWelcome to MalcoGetaways!THIS PROPERTIES BALCONY WILL BE UNDER REPAIR FROM AUGUST 8-MARCH 15TH. THE UNIT IS STILL AVAILABLE TO STAY IN BUT THE BALCONY DOOR AND WINDOW WILL BE COMPLETELY BOARDED UP DURING THIS DURATION; EXPECT SOME NOISE FROM THIS AS WELL.  THERE ARE 3 OTHER WINDOWS IN THIS UNIT FOR LIGHT AND LOOKING OUT BUT THE BALCONY WILL NOT BE OF USE.We have added a Legends Ultimate - ARCADE GAMING CONSOLE! With 300 games to choose from and 2 players! More to enjoy on your stay with us!!Upon arrival, you will pull into the Gulf Winds condo complex, drive to the back, and park close to building number five, the furthest building in the back to your right as you enter. Access is through the first set of stairs as you come in. There is NO ELEVATOR! Your space is on the second floor you will climb two flights of stairs, Unit 523. Perks to this second-level condo are the VIEWS. Once you arrive at Unit 523, you will walk into an ambiance of modernized beach decor, walk to the sliding doors, and step onto your balcony, where you have beautiful views of palm trees and landscape! We have stocked the condo with 4k ultra HD smart TVs, a 70" one in the living room, and a 43" in the master bedroom.  Log In with your account and enjoy Netflix, Sling, Hulu, Prime Video, CH+, Vudu, and Youtube.  Cable and WiFi are provided.  You will have two passes that must be worn by each guest who plans to use the pool amenities.  There are two couches each with a twin pull-out sofa, a small dining table with two barstools, and a beach wagon in the living room.This condo has a fully stocked kitchen with new granite countertops and two barstools. All appliances are stainless steel.You have two full baths, one bathroom in the hall with a stand-up shower and another in the master bedroom with a tub/shower combination.  We do include a hairdryer aside from amenities provided by the cleaning company. The washer and dryer are also located in the hallway.  The Master bedroom has a king-sized bed with two nightstands, a dresser, and a closet. Down the hall is where you will find the bunkbeds.We have provided a beach wagon for your convenience to use during your stay.  Also, for your convenience, there is a grocery delivery service called Grocery Concierge.  This company will get your groceries and stock the condo for a fee.  You can research and find their website online by searching the name of the company.The complex has one pool for your use. Be sure to wear your pool pass while at the pool. This pool is not heated. There are some grills on the grounds for your use as well.We use a cleaning company that provides the needed amount of rags, towels, hand towels, and kitchen towels.  There will be dishwasher detergent, a bathroom shower mat for stepping out of the tub, hand soap, dish soap, paper towels, and toilet paper.  If you need more rags or towels, there is a washer and dryer in this unit.  These are travel-sized amenities, so think hotel.Amount Supplied are:-Eight towels-One shower mat-Four hand towels-Eight ragsFUN LOCAL RENTALS TO DO CLOSE BY - kayaks, paddleboards, jet skis, bicycles, scooters, pontoon boats, sailboat, parasailing, waterpark, fly the boat, dolphin tours, and craigcats! You are a 1-minute drive or 5-minute walk to all of the food and drink locations for Navarre Beach.  Enjoy any of these;  Broussard's of Navarre Beach, Juana's Pagodas, Sailors Grill, Beach House Bar and Grille, Windjammer's, Navarre fishing pier, and the gift shop of the pier.You have a gas station on Navarre Beach, but you will have to drive back across the bridge for shopping needs.  There you can find a Dollar Store, Wal-Mart, Publix, Winn Dixie, and a few tourist locations like Navarre Seafood Market, TC's Front Porch, Vine Wine Bar and Shop, Shark Bite Navarre, TOMMY'S SNOBALLS, and more!From your condo, you are:-20 min drive to Fort Walton-20 min drive to Pensacola Beach-47 min drive to Downtown Pensacola-15 min drive to Gulf Breeze Zoo-30 min drive to National SeashoreFees charged by me:-a cleaning fee of $135.00-refundable deposit of $100.0

more description: Enjoy your stay in Pensacola at Parrot House Nest!Newly built this studio unit is stylishly decorated with a small but full kitchen, a beautiful tile shower, and it's own private entrance and outdoor area.Stay Parrot House is Pensacola owned and operated, we specialize in fully stocked homes that provide a truly comfortable and complete experience.This home is a duplex, though no walls are shared, the laundry facilities are used by both units.The spaceParrot House III is close to NAS and Corry Station.This unit is a lovely and cozy studio unit with a full kitchen. This home features a medium firm King bed.This home is an un-attached Duplex: There is another unit on the property that does not share walls, but is adjacent to this house, and that you share the laundry room with. You have your own private parking, and private backyard area. ________________________PRICINGNightly rate: $69-109 depending on season etc.Pet fee: $30 up to 1 pet (please review pet policy below)Cleaning fee: $60 paid directly to independent cleaning crewIn addition there's an airbnb fee and hospitality taxes that contribute to your total reservation cost.  ____________________DISCOUNTS:Discounts can be combined to equal up to 20% off nightly rate.WEEKLY DISCOUNT: We offer a 10% weekly discount!MILITARY DISCOUNT:10% off base nightly rate- After booking send a picture of your military ID and we will issue a 10% refund._____________________Location:1.3 miles to NAS3 miles to DT23 min to Pcola Beach17 min to Perdido KeyPETS:We are Pet Friendly!We allow 1 pet in this unit with a pet fee of $30. We are happy to consider additional pets, just ask!Your pet needs to be well behaved, and able to play well with others as there is another unit on this property. This unit does have it's own outside area however. The pet fee is for interior cleaning, and you will need to pick up any presents your pet deposits in the yard!Thanks :)

more description: This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit. A one bedroom one bathroom with an additional pull out queen size sofa couch to host up to 4 people. Tall ceilings, gas stove, window AC/heating, stairsLocated in the beautiful historic neighborhood of North Hill.  The area has rich history dating back to the 1700's.  This home was built in 1946 and has stayed true to its original state. Pets are welcome, Area is great for dog walking.  Close to all things.Other things to noteThis is a historical home with all original cabinets, tubs, windows etc. The shear age of the home (70 + years) lends itself to some flaws being evident within the home.  If some rust on the 70 year old bathtub, old windows, original wood flooring or other "historic home" flaws will bother you then I suggest you not rent this unit as uncomfortable stays by a guest end up in horrible negative reviews and low stars for owners whether fair or not, the owner looses out in major review hits.  We strive to keep our guests happy and want to be honest with what to expect at this beautifully restored home.

number of guests: 3 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bedroom Â· **__** Â· 1 bed Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in July 2015**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: New eco chic cottage features high end touches and appliances in a cozy luxe setting. Sitting on the edge of the downtown jurisdiction, you're never too far away from the action on Palafox Street and a quick jaunt over to the beach. A chlorinated, salt water â€œstock tank poolâ€ awaits you in the back for a quick dip to cool off or relax. Excellent access to Wahoos Stadium, Sanders Beach, The Oar House, Pensacola Yacht Club, Pensacola Country Club, Joe Patti's, and Pensacola's Naval Air Station.The spaceThis cottage welcomes you with a quaint covered porch, perfect for enjoying a brief afternoon rainstorm. As you enter the home you're greeted with a spacious entertaining area equipped with a fully stocked kitchen. Large ceilings and high end touches make this "tiny home" present a big impression. As you continue in the home, the hallway to the rear living area includes a utility closet with a full size washer and dryer, as well as access to the bathroom. The master bedroom features a California King size bed and 40" Smart TV. The bedroom also offers a second entrance to the bathroom, which features a large walk in shower with temperature gauge faucet. Last, but not least, the backyard offers an incredible space to sit out and enjoy a cocktail while you relax in the â€œstock tank poolâ€ or grill on the provided electric grill. Tall trees, a small green space, and hanging lights keep the space enjoyable and usable well into the later hours. The central air conditioning and heat are easy to control and is ultra silent. The front entertaining area offers a couch and plush corner chair for seating and also features a 50" Smart TV. This home features internet access with WiFi as well as cable TV, including Showtime. Two beach style cruiser bicycles are also included with the rental of this home, they are provided free of cost with all safety equipment included.

description: Orange Tree Cottage: Entire House, Cute & Charming
name: Cottage in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire cottage hosted byÂ Susan5 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 5 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in August 2017**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Orange Tree Cottage is your home away from home, a cozy place to unwind and relax within 40 minutes of gorgeous sugar-sand beaches. Located in the center of greater Pensacola, you're a short drive from wherever you need to be: the night life of downtown Palafox, wonders of the Naval Aviation Museum at Pensacola NAS, or visiting family and friends. This clean, pristine private house feels fresh and vital, with plenty of lounging space, full kitchen, bonus room, and rustic (non-fenced) backyard.The spaceQuaint 1960s hideaway in established neighborhood, with fresh and clean updates. New paint and flooring, gentle colors, contemporary dÃ©cor, and thoughtful touches. Coffee bar, iron & ironing board, full laundry, everything you need in the kitchen, bonus room where the kids can play or watch tv. The bedrooms feature cozy beds, luggage racks, plus plenty of space in the closet or dresser for clothing. The master bedroom has a tv, each side of both rooms' beds have plugs within easy reach, and the wifi signal is strong throughout the house. The backyard is open and a bit overgrown, but that's just more fun for the kids. It's a quiet street, but also within earshot of the railroad tracks so you can hear the train horn at times. There is a security camera at the front door for extra peace of mind. You're free to arrive at anytime with keypad entry. You're welcome to store bikes or kayaks in the (unsecured) back shed, or you can bring clean(ish) bicycles into the laundry room.

more description: This bright and beachy property sleeps two and is located on the gorgeous island of Navarre Beach.  Enjoy the view of the sound from the private balcony and then take a dip in the semi-private pool.  You will be minutes away from shops, restaurants, and world-famous white sand beaches.  Here on the Emerald Coast, the locals know that the fall and winter are our best kept secrets! Click "Contact Host" now and ask me for a list of my favorite cooler-weather destinations and activities in the area!The spaceThe first thing you notice when you drive over the bridge onto Navarre Beach is how breathtakingly beautiful the Emerald Coast really is! As you drive down our little stretch of Santa Rosa Island, you'll notice that you're within walking distance to several shops, restaurants, and the quartz sand beaches we are world famous for!Located in a small row of beachy townhomes, this unit is a private 1-bedroom apartment that is charming and cozy.  When you walk up the stairs to the home, you'll see the private patio with seating for 2 and a sun umbrella. Inside, the dÃ©cor welcomes you in with it's vibrant colors and cozy atmosphere.  The living room, dining area, and kitchen are on the lower level, with the bedroom, bathroom and closet upstairs.  When you step out of the Casita youâ€™re a short walk from the jaw-dropping sugar sand and turquoise waters of the Gulf of Mexico.  Navarre's 12-mile beach serves as the perfect backdrop for water lovers, shell seekers, sand castle enthusiasts, crab hunters, sun-sleepers, beach readers, nature explorers, paddleboarders, and everything in-between.   It is also home to the longest fishing pier in the state of Florida and the entire Gulf Coast! Navarre Beach has long been considered one of Florida's best kept secrets, and although more people fall in love with our little island each year, the area has maintained its coastal charm. Navarre Beach is conveniently located between Destin and Pensacola, and yet a world apart with its more peaceful and charming vibe.âœ” Comfortable king bedâœ”  Keurig w/ complimentary coffee, tea, and decaf âœ” Plush cotton bath towels and Turkish cotton beach towels providedâœ” Smart TV with Amazon Prime and access to other streaming servicesâœ” Fast and reliable Wi-Fiâœ” Private patio with views of the bayâœ” Strict sanitation standards using safe ingredientsâœ” Close proximity to walking & biking trails, several dining options, and quartz sand beaches

description: Great Tiny Home Near Downtown ~15 minutes to Beach
name: Tiny home in Pensacola
unit rental details: Tiny home hosted byÂ Shanna2 guests Â·  Â· 1 bed Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 2 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bed Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in April 2016**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Try out tiny living in this awesome custom tiny home located Pensacola Florida. Tastefully decorated, relaxing space with abundant natural light. Delight in luxurious white marble countertops, beautiful decor & soft velvety linens. No seashell decor in this cottage! Convenient location near downtown, East Hill, Hwy & only 15 mins to beachThe space*Please note* this is a tiny home located in a very old East Pensacola neighborhood. While many homes around are being renovated and new homes are being built everyday, many families and seniors in the neighborhood have lived there for generations. This isn't San Fransisco, it's Old Pensacola. Pensacola has it's own flavor, history and culture. Tiny homes are different from regular houses. The washer/dryer takes longer than a regular full size machine, the tankless hot water heater runs on propane and may need to be swapped out during your stay, etc. I like the wild vines & palms that grows around the house so it's not perfectly manicured. If you're looking for a pristine million dollar house in a perfectly curated neighborhood, you may not like the vibe. I own the 100+year old home in front which is an airbnb as well. Tiny home sits on the location of another home that was torn down years ago. It's not impossible you could see small pieces of broken glass, bricks or old nails in the yard the house. 200 sqft living space +queen size bed in the upstairs loft. Tiny home is equipped with a kitchenette with mini refrigerator, coffee maker, toaster, convection microwave, dishes, glassware and silverware. There is a small gas grill on the patio.Tiny living doesn't mean you can't enjoy a roomy bathroom with tub/shower. Towels & some toiletries provided. Enjoy a private fenced yard & patio area with small propane grill. Yard is surrounded by 50 yr old camellias, towering oak trees & tropical palms. Beach chairs and cooler available for you to borrow. Private & on street parking available and WiFi is provided.

more description: Welcome to the beautiful Pelican Nest Pensacola Retreat! Gorgeous completely updated large bath with new WHIRLPOOL tub, tile, vanity & shower! GREAT Fiber optic Internet and Netflix. The KING-sized, memory foam bed and inner-spring futon are extremely comfortable! There's a beautiful brand-new wooden stairway and new deck patio leading to a separate entrance overlooking the pool! There's a well-equipped kitchenette w/ an oversized mini fridge. GAME ROOM! BIKES! POOL HEATED on 3/1The spaceWeâ€™re only about a mile to the Bay and 3 miles to beautiful Bay Bluffâ€™s Park!  Weâ€™re close to the airport, downtown, and only about a 20 minute scenic drive to the main beach! Weâ€™re close to many restaurants, shops and conveniences. Weâ€™re in a quiet, prestigious cul-de-sac in the much sought-after NE Pensacola area. Weâ€™ve just added a fence to the pool!! Pictures forthcoming! Recently upgraded AT& T fiber optic Internet speed! New 40â€ TV!!HEATED POOL March 1st-November 1stThis charming apartment is perfect for either short or long-term tenants. The gorgeous 18â€™ x 36â€™ in-ground pool  and patio area are maintained throughout the year. The King-sized memory foam bed is extremely comfortable. (FYI, one side of the bed is against a wall). Your apartment is a dedicated guest space with its own private entrance! You share the laundry room (with a downstairs entrance under your entry stairs), new game room and yard with the main house. The garage suite has our on-site host, David. He'll assist you as needed while allowing you plenty of space-he has his own entry and patio area. Itâ€™s set up like condos. The kitchenette has an oversized mini-fridge, two top-burner toaster/convection oven, coffee maker, toaster, and all supplies. There's a full-sized, comfortable, inner-spring futon, new kitchen table and many other new items. You will enter from the backyard patio area and you will go up the stairs. Thereâ€™s a keypad entry. Everything is well-lit with three motion-detector lights as you enter the apartment. You will need to step down 6.5 inches into the apartment.We apologize, but we can't accept any animals. There are some shared spaces and there are a few plants that are toxic to dogs. There's a wonderful, very reasonably priced and highly rated vet just down the street that boards animals. AIRBNB RATINGS:We strive for 5 stars for our guests.We humbly request that as a guest, you make your needs/wants known and allow us to make everything as comfortable and convenient as possible. We want our guests to enjoy the space and beautiful Pensacola! Please be aware that Airbnb ratings are not the same as hotel ratings. 4's are considered unacceptable by Airbnb. Most importantly, please enjoy the beautiful area and our guest spaces as much as we hope you will!! Your hosts,Paul and Elayne Petrucci

more description: Historic East Hill home in safe neighborhood, #1 has PRIVATE ENTRANCE/ALL SPACE IS PRIVATE, 11 ft. ceilings, huge bath with marble walk-in shower/ tub, kitchenette (MW, frig, coffee maker, toaster), private patio/gas grill and small yard, off-street parking, KING BED, 15 min. to the beach, 3 min. to downtown/cafes & shops/ event center, many restaurants within 2 minute drive, grocery 4 blocks.   #4 has full kitchen/laundry for longer stays, #2 and #3 have separate bedroom/LR, #3 is pet friendlyThe space1906 original home has a spacious one bedroom/sitting area with ensuite bath, private entrance, private kitchenette, original wood floors, large windows with natural light. This suite #1  (550 square feet) is located in a restored modern 1906 house;  the suite is connected to the main house but is totally private.  TV with cable, fast WIFI  This home is near (15 minute drive) world renowned Pensacola Beach, only 3-4 minutes from historic downtown Pensacola's great shopping/dining and the major event center (Bay Center). This has often been our honeymoon suite.

more description: Simple & Standard Large Two Bedroom Home Centrally Located Near Navarre BeachThe spaceSummaryThis simplistic no frills home is the perfect place for a home-base. Equipped with a washer/dryer, full kitchen with a dining room table, den, living room, and workspace youâ€™ll love to call this easy-going space home for a vacation, work trip, etc.10 min to Navarre Beach10 min to Hurlburt Field15 min to Fort Walton Beach/Okaloosa Island20 min to DestinSkip the hotel and crowds and bring the family! NEW LISTINGThe SpaceThis is the Main house listing. There is a guest suite located in the backyard of the property, which is booked separately.Both the Main house and Guest Suite are completely separate and Private areas. However, the backyard is shared.Once you arrive through the front door, you'll find an open living room space; this area offers ample seating options along with a smart tv for entertainment.The dining room table is centrally placed in the home.The full kitchen is equipped with a full fridge,oven, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, dishware, cookware, silverware, and drip coffee machine with coffee and extras.To the right of the home you'll find another living room space (den) this space also offers ample seating, smart tv, fireplace, along with a nook style designated work space.The left side of the home offers a guest bedroom with a queen bed.The master bedroom includes a king bed with a master bath.Through the hall you'll find the laundry closet and second full bathroom.Interaction with GuestsThis property is equipped with a state-of-the-art contactless entry system. Once you book, you will receive detailed check-in instructions along with your 4 digit access code granting you access the minute your reservation begins. Checking into to this house is as easy and smooth as it gets. As super-hosts, we are here when you need us but there is no need to be overwhelmed by us.We choose to have minimal interaction with guests. We respect our guests time and know you are on vacation to relax and unwind. We try and provide everything you need in order to do just that. Relax & enjoy your stay!

more description: This is a 500-sq-ft a studio apartment.  The space includes a bathroom, a walk-in closet, and combined kitchen, living room, and bedroom area.  These are the only areas included in the stay price.  There is a large screen that can be used to separate areas as needed.  This is attached to the main house, but it has its own entrance.  It has its own ac/heater and thermostat.Laundry facilities are available for free, but must be scheduled AHEAD of time.Wifi and internet are included.The spaceThe photos represent the space as a whole.  Things are replaced as they are broken.  We upgrade things in the unit.  It may not appear exactly as it does in the pictures.  The quality will never be less than what is pictured.The property is located in a middle-class, quiet, safe, family-filled neighborhood.We're right off Scenic Highway, near Creighton and Spanish Trail.  The airport and Cordova mall are 10 minutes away.  There are plenty of restaurants within 5 minutes of driving. There are two bars nearby that you can reach by foot - O'Riley's Uptown Tavern is about a ten-minute walk, and The Spanish Trail is only about a five-minute walk.Pensacola Beach is less than 20 minutes away, but can take longer depending on day of the week and season (summer traffic is typically very heavy on weekends - leave early to avoid traffic).It is usually less than a $15 Uber ride to downtown which has several restaurants, shops, and bars.  The cost for an Uber can vary if there are events going on down town, so please check.The unit is cleaned after each guest.  Cleaning services during a stay are not included in the stay price. If you want additional cleaning services, we can make arrangements in advance.

more description: Stunning beach-themed room, illuminating lights, An immaculate four-poster bed, standup dresser, nightstand, Wi-Fi, Smart TV, loveseat, microwave, mini-fridge/freezer, mirror, and coffee pot all within the room.The spaceYour room is accessed at the side of our home with a keypad lock entrance (we will provide this code when booked before arrival). Once inside you will be in our laundry room and your room is just to your left as the two spaces are connected. The room has a Queen sized bed and is topped with memory foam!Within your room, you will find special snacks, amenities, and waters PLUS a coffee maker with a starter coffee packet and some tea bags. All are complimentary!In the laundry space which is right outside your room, we provide half of the cabinet space for you to hang clothes also in this cabinet will be extra blankets and iron. Feel free to also use the ironing board (we will provide tide pods in your room). AND absolutely use the washer and dryer as needed!Your bathroom is through the kitchen, across the living room, in the hallway. For showering needs, we have a tub/shower combination. The bathroom is primarily private unless we have personal guests of our own. We also allow you to share the living room, sunroom, pool, and kitchen with us!We are just 10 min. to Pensacola beach, 23 min. from the airport, 12 min. to the zoo, 20 min from Downtown Pensacola, and just off Gulf Breeze Pkwy the central transport to most all attractions nearby.If you want a nice getaway with free parking close we are just 5 min away from Oriole Beach Public Boat Ramp, a great place to take your boat, kayak, fishing poles, and trap crabs!Bring your golf clubs and enjoy a day at Tiger Point Golf Club for just 5 min. away!The area has both Uber and Lyft for any commuting needs.The area offers many events year-round.

more description: You have found Perdido Key's hidden gem Pescador Landing Condominiums on Old River. The pristine beaches of The Gulf of Mexico are across the street and you are only a very short walk to the famous Flora-Bama Bar and restaurants. This newly built condo will have you relaxed and never wanting to leave. Enjoy picturesque sunsets, fishing, boating, water sports and great views!!! Gorgeous one bedroom condo on the 1st floor. This unit boasts a king size bed in the primary bedroom with a flat screen tv. The living room features a queen size sleeper sofa and plenty of seating & second full bathroom. Entire condo is painted in beach inspired colors. The kitchen is complete with beautiful granite counter tops, appliances and everything you need to make your stay more enjoyable. There is a washer & dryer available in the unit for your convenience. The patio has comfortable seating and an electric grill. Perfect for enjoying the great views of boating, dolphins, and everything Old River has to offer.

It's convenient to the speedway and the Pensacola Fair Grounds. Only a few miles to I-10.  Shopping and restaurants are within walking distance. The neighborhood is safe and there are alarms on all doors and windows anyway so no one is coming in without others hearing it!  There is a code for the door and I will give it to you before arriving if I can't be here to let you in.  You can use the kitchen please clean up after yourself.  No quests without asking first.

more description: You have found Perdido Key's hidden gem Pescador Landing Condominiums on Old River. The pristine beaches of The Gulf of Mexico are across the street and you are only a very short walk to the famous Flora-Bama Bar and restaurants. This newly built condo will have you relaxed and never wanting to leave. Enjoy picturesque sunsets, fishing, boating, water sports and great views!!! Gorgeous one bedroom condo on the 1st floor. This unit boasts a king size bed in the primary bedroom with a flat screen tv. The living room features a queen size sleeper sofa and plenty of seating & second full bathroom. Entire condo is painted in beach inspired colors. The kitchen is complete with beautiful granite counter tops, appliances and everything you need to make your stay more enjoyable. There is a washer & dryer available in the unit for your convenience. The patio has comfortable seating and an electric grill. Perfect for enjoying the great views of boating, dolphins, and everything Old River has to offer.

name: Home in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire home hosted by Timothy &Â Marie6 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2021**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Cooper's Cottage a beautifully renovated 1933 home in the Garden District of Pensacola less than one mile from downtowns historic Seville Square and  Palafox St. where you will enjoy bars, restaurants , shopping, art galleries and more. Just 15 min to Pensacola beach and close to NAS home of the Blue Angels. Relax in our fully fenced, pet friendly back yard with gas grill, outdoor dining, lounge seating with fire pit. There are 2 bikes, outdoor games and more. Smart TVs in each roomThe spaceNewly renovated, two bedroom, two bathroom cottage conveniently located in downtown, Pensacola. The home is in the Garden District that has quaint older homes being  remodeled while new homes are being added. The spacious front porch has a swing for enjoying your morning coffee. As you enter you will find a comfortable living room with a queen size sleeper sofa with  gel foam mattress, leather chair, coffee table, large smart TV featuring You Tube TV, Netflix etc. We offer a desk/work space area with complimentary smart phone charger for use during your stay. Make yourself a home cooked meal in our spacious fully equipped kitchen or if you like use the gas grill to barbeque some steaks. Full size washer and dryer.Get a restful sleep on a comfortable queen memory foam bed with soft linens. Large En Suite bathroom featuring a rain head shower, dual sinks, hair dryer and hotel style amenities. The second bedroom offers a comfortable queen bed along with smart TV.  Second bathroom with tub. Each bedroom offers extra pillows and blankets for your comfort and  luxury towels in bathrooms. Enjoy all the backyard has to offer with our large deck featuring gas grill and  dining area. Sit back and enjoy a beverage under the Heritage Oak tree while lounging on the comfortable patio sofa and chairs. Other amenities are gas fire pit with table, corn hole game, darts, lawn games and more.We offer two cruiser bikes with all safety equipment if you want to take a ride downtown. Also beach chairs and towels to use at Pensacola beach just a short 15 minute drive.

more description: This charming home is eight blocks from Pensacolaâ€™s popular, bayfront downtown. Shopping, eateries, Pensacola Beach, and the U.S. Naval Air Station are minutes away. One recent guest said, "This place is top-notch from the location...to the communication with the host. The house is so cozy, I was starting to blend in...Kim, you are a superhost for a reason." The Wright House is such a great place to stay for work or play that we have several guests return each year.The spaceThe Wright House is ideal for a peaceful respite from every day pressures and offers guests a home away from home. It is well-maintained, super clean and comfortable. Built in 1918, the house is totally renovated from top to bottom and includes a well-equipped galley kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and new cabinetry. Many guests tell us they love having everything they need to prepare meals, leisurely enjoy their morning coffee or, even, bake cookies.  Furnishings include a queen bed in the master and a single bed in a smaller bedroom; a leather sleeper sofa, 55-inch TV and eating space in the living room. Wi-fi is available. (See "amenities" on this page.) Guests also can do their laundry on site. The bathroom is fully-tiled with a walk-in shower and spacious, granite vanity. Guests take advantage of Pensacola's climate by relaxing on the extra large back deck and covered front porch.

more description: This is a 500-sq-ft a studio apartment.  The space includes a bathroom, a walk-in closet, and combined kitchen, living room, and bedroom area.  These are the only areas included in the stay price.  There is a large screen that can be used to separate areas as needed.  This is attached to the main house, but it has its own entrance.  It has its own ac/heater and thermostat.Laundry facilities are available for free, but must be scheduled AHEAD of time.Wifi and internet are included.The spaceThe photos represent the space as a whole.  Things are replaced as they are broken.  We upgrade things in the unit.  It may not appear exactly as it does in the pictures.  The quality will never be less than what is pictured.The property is located in a middle-class, quiet, safe, family-filled neighborhood.We're right off Scenic Highway, near Creighton and Spanish Trail.  The airport and Cordova mall are 10 minutes away.  There are plenty of restaurants within 5 minutes of driving. There are two bars nearby that you can reach by foot - O'Riley's Uptown Tavern is about a ten-minute walk, and The Spanish Trail is only about a five-minute walk.Pensacola Beach is less than 20 minutes away, but can take longer depending on day of the week and season (summer traffic is typically very heavy on weekends - leave early to avoid traffic).It is usually less than a $15 Uber ride to downtown which has several restaurants, shops, and bars.  The cost for an Uber can vary if there are events going on down town, so please check.The unit is cleaned after each guest.  Cleaning services during a stay are not included in the stay price. If you want additional cleaning services, we can make arrangements in advance.

more description: Step into this gated lakefront lodge-style home situated on 4.2 acres of private property and equipped with all the modern conveniences. Leave your worries behind as you turn the key into this two-bedroom, two-and-a-half-bath cabin. Here you will enjoy the sounds of nature and indulge in the peace and quiet away from city life. Pictures don't do the lodge justice.... You need to experience it for yourself!The spacePulling into the gates, you will find the driveway leading to the Lodge, which will be on the right and the small lake on the left. You will enter the house through the front door, and park in the circular driveway. Once inside, the first floor has a bright and open kitchen,  large formal dining room, laundry room, bedroom, and bathroom. Going upstairs, you will find an open loft area used as an office space, as well as the master bedroom and bathroom.I do live on property, in a separate apartment away from the house so if you need anything Iâ€™m just a phone call away!

more description: Welcome! Our 1 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment can comfortably sleep 4 guests.  Perfect for small families, couples, or traveling professionals!  This property is centrally located and close to everything Pensacola has to offer.  This fully furnish rental is less than 2 miles from downtown and just a short drive to the Pensacola International Airport, Naval Air Station Pensacola, and Pensacola Beach! In-unit laundry, free WiFi, and pet friendly with a fee.  We would love to host you!The spaceGuests will climb the exterior stairs to get to the unit and enter through the front door using a digital keypad.  Once inside, you will be welcomed in to the open concept living space.  The living is furnished with a queen sleeper sofa, arm chair, and large SmartTV.  The space flows right into the fully-equipped kitchen and the dining room.This apartment offers one private king-sized bedroom and one full bathroom.****Please note this is an upstairs unit at a side-by-side duplex.  You will have full and private access to your unit.  The parking pad is shared and has 1 assigned spot for each unit. Street parking is available****

more description: This charming home is eight blocks from Pensacolaâ€™s popular, bayfront downtown. Shopping, eateries, Pensacola Beach, and the U.S. Naval Air Station are minutes away. One recent guest said, "This place is top-notch from the location...to the communication with the host. The house is so cozy, I was starting to blend in...Kim, you are a superhost for a reason." The Wright House is such a great place to stay for work or play that we have several guests return each year.The spaceThe Wright House is ideal for a peaceful respite from every day pressures and offers guests a home away from home. It is well-maintained, super clean and comfortable. Built in 1918, the house is totally renovated from top to bottom and includes a well-equipped galley kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and new cabinetry. Many guests tell us they love having everything they need to prepare meals, leisurely enjoy their morning coffee or, even, bake cookies.  Furnishings include a queen bed in the master and a single bed in a smaller bedroom; a leather sleeper sofa, 55-inch TV and eating space in the living room. Wi-fi is available. (See "amenities" on this page.) Guests also can do their laundry on site. The bathroom is fully-tiled with a walk-in shower and spacious, granite vanity. Guests take advantage of Pensacola's climate by relaxing on the extra large back deck and covered front porch.
