more description: Situated just east of Pensacola and just north of Pensacola Beach, our place is located in a quiet neighborhood, just a short drive from amazing restaurants and the most beautiful, snow white beaches in Florida. Our private suite has one bedroom, one bathroom and an open living/kitchen area.  Sleep up to four guests with a queen bed in the bedroom and a new queen size pull out sofa in the living area.The spaceSituated just east of Pensacola and just north of Pensacola Beach, our place is located in a quiet neighborhood, just a short drive from amazing restaurants and the most beautiful, snow white beaches in Florida. Our private suite has one bedroom, one bathroom and an open living/kitchen area.  Sleep up to four guests with a queen bed in the bedroom and a new queen size pull out sofa in the living area.  The space had some recent updates including a brand new central AC system. Enjoy coffee in the morning on the deck overlooking the canal.  Weâ€™re located straight across the sound from the Portofino  Island resort, where on Friday nights during the summer you can enjoy their fireworks show from our deck.  You can always find fish and birds in our area, and sometimes the occasional dolphin or manatee will make its way up the canal towards our home.  The Blue Angels sometimes fly over during practice days and on their trips back to NAS on Sundays.  We're a quick walk over to the Tiger Point Golf Club, which you can see from the front windows. This suite is located on the second floor with outdoor staircase access only (if you are not comfortable with stairs, we do not recommend).  It has a private entrance,  with brand new French doors and keyless entry, and parking for one car in the driveway. Weâ€™re close to grocery stores, restaurants and shops.  A quick drive to Pensacola Beach to enjoy the amazing beaches and sea life.  We have towels  for you to use on your beach trips and sometimes chairs and an umbrella. Weâ€™re a quick drive to downtown Pensacola for amazing restaurants, shopping and shows.  Weâ€™re happy to share our recommendations for the area, please ask! We have kayaks/lifejackets (2 adult single, 2 youth single) available for your use, please let us know before arriving if you'd like to use them so we can have the life jackets available. .   There are no laundry facilities within the apartment, but we can coordinate as needed or there is coin laundry just outside the neighborhood.

name: Home in Pensacola

number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in April 2021**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Welcome to Cooper's Cottage a beautifully renovated 1933 home in the Garden District of Pensacola less than one mile from downtowns historic Seville Square and  Palafox St. where you will enjoy bars, restaurants , shopping, art galleries and more. Just 15 min to Pensacola beach and close to NAS home of the Blue Angels. Relax in our fully fenced, pet friendly back yard with gas grill, outdoor dining, lounge seating with fire pit. There are 2 bikes, outdoor games and more. Smart TVs in each roomThe spaceNewly renovated, two bedroom, two bathroom cottage conveniently located in downtown, Pensacola. The home is in the Garden District that has quaint older homes being  remodeled while new homes are being added. The spacious front porch has a swing for enjoying your morning coffee. As you enter you will find a comfortable living room with a queen size sleeper sofa with  gel foam mattress, leather chair, coffee table, large smart TV featuring You Tube TV, Netflix etc. We offer a desk/work space area with complimentary smart phone charger for use during your stay. Make yourself a home cooked meal in our spacious fully equipped kitchen or if you like use the gas grill to barbeque some steaks. Full size washer and dryer.Get a restful sleep on a comfortable queen memory foam bed with soft linens. Large En Suite bathroom featuring a rain head shower, dual sinks, hair dryer and hotel style amenities. The second bedroom offers a comfortable queen bed along with smart TV.  Second bathroom with tub. Each bedroom offers extra pillows and blankets for your comfort and  luxury towels in bathrooms. Enjoy all the backyard has to offer with our large deck featuring gas grill and  dining area. Sit back and enjoy a beverage under the Heritage Oak tree while lounging on the comfortable patio sofa and chairs. Other amenities are gas fire pit with table, corn hole game, darts, lawn games and more.We offer two cruiser bikes with all safety equipment if you want to take a ride downtown. Also beach chairs and towels to use at Pensacola beach just a short 15 minute drive.

more description: Welcome to the beautiful Pelican Nest Pensacola Retreat! Gorgeous completely updated large bath with new WHIRLPOOL tub, tile, vanity & shower! GREAT Fiber optic Internet and Netflix. The KING-sized, memory foam bed and inner-spring futon are extremely comfortable! There's a beautiful brand-new wooden stairway and new deck patio leading to a separate entrance overlooking the pool! There's a well-equipped kitchenette w/ an oversized mini fridge. GAME ROOM! BIKES! POOL HEATED on 3/1The spaceWeâ€™re only about a mile to the Bay and 3 miles to beautiful Bay Bluffâ€™s Park!  Weâ€™re close to the airport, downtown, and only about a 20 minute scenic drive to the main beach! Weâ€™re close to many restaurants, shops and conveniences. Weâ€™re in a quiet, prestigious cul-de-sac in the much sought-after NE Pensacola area. Weâ€™ve just added a fence to the pool!! Pictures forthcoming! Recently upgraded AT& T fiber optic Internet speed! New 40â€ TV!!HEATED POOL March 1st-November 1stThis charming apartment is perfect for either short or long-term tenants. The gorgeous 18â€™ x 36â€™ in-ground pool  and patio area are maintained throughout the year. The King-sized memory foam bed is extremely comfortable. (FYI, one side of the bed is against a wall). Your apartment is a dedicated guest space with its own private entrance! You share the laundry room (with a downstairs entrance under your entry stairs), new game room and yard with the main house. The garage suite has our on-site host, David. He'll assist you as needed while allowing you plenty of space-he has his own entry and patio area. Itâ€™s set up like condos. The kitchenette has an oversized mini-fridge, two top-burner toaster/convection oven, coffee maker, toaster, and all supplies. There's a full-sized, comfortable, inner-spring futon, new kitchen table and many other new items. You will enter from the backyard patio area and you will go up the stairs. Thereâ€™s a keypad entry. Everything is well-lit with three motion-detector lights as you enter the apartment. You will need to step down 6.5 inches into the apartment.We apologize, but we can't accept any animals. There are some shared spaces and there are a few plants that are toxic to dogs. There's a wonderful, very reasonably priced and highly rated vet just down the street that boards animals. AIRBNB RATINGS:We strive for 5 stars for our guests.We humbly request that as a guest, you make your needs/wants known and allow us to make everything as comfortable and convenient as possible. We want our guests to enjoy the space and beautiful Pensacola! Please be aware that Airbnb ratings are not the same as hotel ratings. 4's are considered unacceptable by Airbnb. Most importantly, please enjoy the beautiful area and our guest spaces as much as we hope you will!! Your hosts,Paul and Elayne Petrucci

more description: Welcome to the Tranquil Seas! Come enjoy beautiful views, coffee on the balconies, and the peaceful waters. Our oasis sits directly on a calm, private, shallow cove of Perdido Bay, providing the perfect place for families to play safely. This 2 bed/2.5 bath sleeps 4-6 and includes a fully stocked kitchen, laundry, 2 Kayaks, and more! Spend all day right here enjoying the quiet serenity, tucked away from the hustle and bustle. Or take a short 5 minute drive to Perdido Key Beach, restaurants, etc.The spaceThis is our newest listing here at Innerarity Townhomes! Until we can establish some reviews for this one, please reference the hundreds of other reviews we have for all of our other units at the same location. Rest assure that we will be providing the same great service and accommodations that we have for all our other guests and properties! This is a three story townhouse directly on Perdido Bay, perfect for relaxing and isolating. The lower level is the carport, which includes an area for parking, relaxing in the shade, and direct water access just mere steps away. You will enter the front door at this Level 1 and then take a flight of stairs to Level 2. There you will find the living room, dining room, balcony, kitchen, laundry, and half bath. Another flight of stairs will take you to the two bedrooms and two bathrooms on Level 3. The master suite offers a queen bed and has its own private bathroom and balcony. The guest room has a queen bed as well. The guest room also offers beautiful views and a bathroom right next to it.

One mile from PNS airport, 13 miles from our famous sugar sand beaches, 8 miles from UWF and Naval Air Station, this  HeidAway Studio is centrally located!The spaceThe HeidAway Studio is off of my open air garage (you have a private, keyless entrance) which has been transformed into a spacious activity area with outdoor seating, a table and bar stools for playing card or board games, ceiling fan and  mosquito protection.  In addition, you can enjoy a private fenced in, astroturfed  courtyard with chairs, sunbrella, fountain, lovely plants and mood lighting The  Studio shares a joint wall and dead bolt locked door with my house, but your bedroom, mini kitchenette, spacious bathroom and laundry room are all yours, entirely private. more description: Simple & Standard Large Two Bedroom Home Centrally Located Near Navarre BeachThe spaceSummaryThis simplistic no frills home is the perfect place for a home-base. Equipped with a washer/dryer, full kitchen with a dining room table, den, living room, and workspace youâ€™ll love to call this easy-going space home for a vacation, work trip, etc.10 min to Navarre Beach10 min to Hurlburt Field15 min to Fort Walton Beach/Okaloosa Island20 min to DestinSkip the hotel and crowds and bring the family! NEW LISTINGThe SpaceThis is the Main house listing. There is a guest suite located in the backyard of the property, which is booked separately.Both the Main house and Guest Suite are completely separate and Private areas. However, the backyard is shared.Once you arrive through the front door, you'll find an open living room space; this area offers ample seating options along with a smart tv for entertainment.The dining room table is centrally placed in the home.The full kitchen is equipped with a full fridge,oven, microwave, dishwasher, toaster, dishware, cookware, silverware, and drip coffee machine with coffee and extras.To the right of the home you'll find another living room space (den) this space also offers ample seating, smart tv, fireplace, along with a nook style designated work space.The left side of the home offers a guest bedroom with a queen bed.The master bedroom includes a king bed with a master bath.Through the hall you'll find the laundry closet and second full bathroom.Interaction with GuestsThis property is equipped with a state-of-the-art contactless entry system. Once you book, you will receive detailed check-in instructions along with your 4 digit access code granting you access the minute your reservation begins. Checking into to this house is as easy and smooth as it gets. As super-hosts, we are here when you need us but there is no need to be overwhelmed by us.We choose to have minimal interaction with guests. We respect our guests time and know you are on vacation to relax and unwind. We try and provide everything you need in order to do just that. Relax & enjoy your stay!

more description: Love the charm of an older home, but require the comforts of a modern one? Welcome to the Red Door Bungalow with its original wood floors and clawfoot tub! This quaint home is half a mile from the center of downtown Pensacola. Local restaurants, Blue Wahoos stadium, shopping, libary, and night life are around the corner. 10 mins from NAS. 15 min to the beach. Splash pad and park are located right across the street. This home is perfect for that quick getaway or mid-term stay!The spaceYou'll enjoy a large and well-equipped kitchen, 2 cozy bedrooms, 1 historical bathroom, a light-filled living and dining room, sufficient laundry space, and a covered outdoor patio space.

more description:
The spaceJohns Place - DowntownThere's nothing like a fun getaway to Pensacola, and this lovely two-bedroom home will make for a fantastic home base! You'll be just a short bike ride from Palafox Street, local festivals, and fantastic beaches. You'll love the French-Quarter feel of the home and its private front porch, which is ideal for relaxing. The shared courtyard is a great place to host a fun barbecue via the gas grill, and you'll love gathering around the shared fire table for an evening of drinks and conversation. 

Inside, you'll find glossy, burnished floors and comfortable furniture. The full kitchen has all the stainless steel appliances and counter space you'll need to prepare delicious meals. The living area boasts a TV for those fun movie nights with friends, and the fast WiFi will make it easy to stay connected. The washer/dryer will ensure everyone looks their best during your stay.

THINGS TO KNOW
There is a queen-size sofa bed in the living area. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles.  All guest parking is to the right  side of building. Enter unit at the front porch. Do not block drive way on the left.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

Southwind is perfect for a family beach vacation or a girls weekend! There are plenty of close activities to choose from including nightlife, boat ramps, restaurants, and family activities, less than 6 miles away on Pensacola Beach! At the end of the day watch a movie with one of the 3 smart TVs or enjoy a cookout in the backyard.Guest accessWhen you arrive, you need to place your hand on the door keypad and a two-digit security code will light up. Plug those numbers in to gain access to the lighted keypad. Once the keypad lights up, put in your code which is a four digit number that was sent to you. This will be your code for your stay.There are two parking spaces in the front of the house.

Beachgoers can lounge on the pristine sands nearby, while history buffs can explore Fort Pickens or tour the Pensacola Lighthouse & Maritime Museum. Indulge in a fresh seafood meal before returning to relax around the fire pit with loved ones and unwind with your favorite show on the Smart TV.The spacePool Access | Washer/Dryer | Spacious Fenced PatioBedroom 1: Queen Bed | Bedroom 2: Full BedBAHAMA BAY AMENITIES: Outdoor pool, clubhouse, fitness centerOUTDOOR LIVING: Cushioned seating, large propane fire pit, retro mini fridgeKITCHEN: Fridge, stove/oven, dishwasher, microwave, cooking basics, coffee maker, toaster, blender, dishware/flatware, paper towels/trash bagsINDOOR LIVING: 3 Smart TVs, cableGENERAL: Free WiFi, linens/towels, washer/dryer, central air conditioning, ceiling fans, complimentary toiletries, iron/boardFAQ: Step-free entry, all bedrooms upstairsPARKING: Open community lot (2 vehicles), no trailer parking allowed

more description: Welcome! Our 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment can comfortably sleep 8 guests! This property is centrally located and close to everything Pensacola has to offer.  This fully furnish rental is less than 2 miles from downtown and just a short drive to the Pensacola International Airport, Naval Air Station Pensacola, and Pensacola Beach! In-unit laundry, free WiFi, and pet friendly with a fee.  We would love to host you!The spaceGuests will be staying in the lower unit and will enter through the back door nearest the parking pad using a digital keypad. Once inside,  you will enter into the fully-equipped kitchen and dining room. Through this space is the living room.  This room is furnished with a queen sleeper sofa, two arm chairs, and a large SmartTV.  This unit has two bedrooms.  The first bedroom features a full-size bed and the second bedroom has 2 full-size beds.  The full bathroom is shared between the two bedrooms, it has a shower tub combination.****Please note this is a downstairs unit at a side-by-side duplex.  You will have full and private access to your unit.  The parking pad is shared and has 1 assigned spot for each unit. Street parking is available****

name: Guesthouse in Pensacola
unit rental details: Entire guesthouse hosted byÂ David7 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 2 beds Â·  Â· 1 bath
number of guests: 7 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 2 beds Â· **__** Â· 1 bath**__**Joined in October 2018**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: This Historic Cottage was built as the guest house to the Gustav Eitzen Historic Home (c. 1899) on nearly a half acre in Historic North Hill. A 10-minute walk to the heart of Downtown, this is an ideal location for seeing Pensacola and retreating to your own hidden garden. You have the whole home, and shared access to the yard. There is a Queen bedroom, office with twin bed, living room with two couches (one folds to a bed), a queen air mattress, as well as a full kitchen and laundry.The spaceThis charming guest house looks out over a nearly half acre property in downtown / Historic North Hill Pensacola. You will be a short walk from all the downtown bars, breweries, restaurants that Pensacola has to offer, and a short drive to the gorgeous white sand of Pensacola Beach and neighboring beaches. The home has a single bed and bath, with large living room, office/bedroom with a twin bed, full kitchen, and a private sitting area behind the home perfect for afternoon picnics or morning coffee. The bedroom has a queen bed, and the living room has two couches - one which folds in to a bed - and room to set up the included adjustable firmness air mattress to easily sleep 2-4 more in the living room. There is a stacked washer/dryer, and a smart TV in the living room. Wifi is also provided.

more description: Welcome to our Waterfront Condo on the World's Whitest Beaches! We have everything you need for a relaxing and convenient getaway. Our building has exclusive amenities including a sauna, inground pool overlooking the water, tennis courts, gym, outdoor fire pit and a grass lawn for other sports. Slips are available right out back for an additional charge if you want to bring your boat to explore during your stay!   This unit has a luxurious king bed in the master and a queen sleeper sofa in the living room to accommodate the whole family, but still allow for privacy. We hope to host you soon!The spaceOur space is cozy and modern with fresh linens and amazing views. We stock a full coffee bar with Keurig Duo for pods or grounds, a French press, and an assortment of coffees and creamers.

more description: Relax in this beautifully remodeled and decorated two bedroom bungalow. Located in the esteemed neighborhood of East Hill. This quiet neighborhood offers relaxation and enjoyment without the commotion. Minutes from the beach downtown Pensacola, shopping, and restaurants. Come sip some southern sweet tea on the front porch or curl up on the couch with that favorite summer book when your not enjoying all that wonders that Pensacola has to offer.  If relaxation is what you need. Come be our guest.The spaceThis adorable little craftsman has everything you could want for a nice relaxing vacation. Smart tv's in the living room and both bedrooms with internet and cable. Their is a washer and dryer for your convenience, a full kitchen with everything you need to create your favorite meals. Large back yard perfect for that morning coffee, and some bird watching, and then the beautiful and comfy front porch that seems like it was made for southern relaxation.

more description: Sweet on Strong Street - Unit B is centrally located with easy access to everything Pensacola has to offer! This 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom property is less than a mile from downtown and is a short drive to the Pensacola International Airport and Naval Air Station Pensacola. It is the perfect location for anyone looking to go out and explore!The spaceGuests will enter through the door located on the front porch.  Once inside, you will be welcomed to our open concept living room and kitchen. You will find everything you need, a full kitchen, queen sleeper sofa, and large SmartTV. Our kitchen comes with everything you need to make dining-in a breeze. Just off the kitchen you will find the bathroom, it has a beautiful clawfoot tub! Our generously sized bedroom comes fitted with a very comfortable queen size bed, it's the perfect spot to rest at the end of the day.We hope you find some time to sit outside and enjoy the front porch, it's a great place to start your day and to hang out while you grill! This open concept living quarters is perfect for any couple, small family, or business professional visiting Pensacola!**Please note, this is a duplex and the back side of this house is also available to rent.**

more description: Charm filled 1903 cottage in the heart of the historic district of downtown Pensacola , one block from Seville Square and a short walk to one of America's greatest main streets "Palafox Street". This one bedroom cottage has been completely renovated with modern comfort and style.  Walk to great restaurants, local bars, art galleries, the minor league baseball park, and shopping or simply relax on the front porch and greet the locals.The spaceThe cottage has a living room, bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom. A small front porch for relaxing and a small fenced courtyard in back for relaxing outdoors.The cottage is professionally cleaned after each guest and all linens/towels are laundered and sanitized by East Hill Laundry.

more description: Love the charm of an older home, but require the comforts of a modern one? Welcome to the Red Door Bungalow with its original wood floors and clawfoot tub! This quaint home is half a mile from the center of downtown Pensacola. Local restaurants, Blue Wahoos stadium, shopping, libary, and night life are around the corner. 10 mins from NAS. 15 min to the beach. Splash pad and park are located right across the street. This home is perfect for that quick getaway or mid-term stay!The spaceYou'll enjoy a large and well-equipped kitchen, 2 cozy bedrooms, 1 historical bathroom, a light-filled living and dining room, sufficient laundry space, and a covered outdoor patio space.

more description:
The spaceJohns Place - DowntownThere's nothing like a fun getaway to Pensacola, and this lovely two-bedroom home will make for a fantastic home base! You'll be just a short bike ride from Palafox Street, local festivals, and fantastic beaches. You'll love the French-Quarter feel of the home and its private front porch, which is ideal for relaxing. The shared courtyard is a great place to host a fun barbecue via the gas grill, and you'll love gathering around the shared fire table for an evening of drinks and conversation. 

Inside, you'll find glossy, burnished floors and comfortable furniture. The full kitchen has all the stainless steel appliances and counter space you'll need to prepare delicious meals. The living area boasts a TV for those fun movie nights with friends, and the fast WiFi will make it easy to stay connected. The washer/dryer will ensure everyone looks their best during your stay.

THINGS TO KNOW
There is a queen-size sofa bed in the living area. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.This rental is located on floor 1.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles.  All guest parking is to the right  side of building. Enter unit at the front porch. Do not block drive way on the left.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. Close to dining, shopping and outdoor activities. Relax in the Private Pool, or enjoy a day of shopping or a short ride to the beach. This unit has 3 bedrooms, 1 bath, full kitchen, including dishwasher, dining area, living room and a bonus room which offers a dedicated work space. Property has free parking, smart TVs, free Wi-Fi, washer, dryer and dishwasher.The spacePrivate and Spacious Single family residence situated on large lot in a quiet neighborhood, features a private pool, Complimentary Wi-Fi, Free parking, 3 bedrooms, 1 full bath, a fully equipped kitchen, family room, Smart TV's, bonus room with a dedicated work space, free washer & dryer, carport and outdoor furniture.While the pool is kept clean and offers a relaxing area to sit, the pool is closed for swimming Nov-Feb. more description: -ON THE NATIONAL REGISTER OF HISTORIC PLACES- Circa 1889Historically known as "The Spanish Consulate". Also known as "The Castle". The house is a Pensacola landmark. In addition to a spectacular suite and bathroom ( Jacuzzi , rain shower, wall sparays), you'll love the outdoor saline spa and pool .Fridge, microwave and Keurig coffeemaker  The entire house water is filtered and softened.The spaceExperience the serenity and peace. The luxuries of the Consulate General suite begin with it's own private sitting room, complete with large flatscreen TV, hideaway bed for one, and a personal library. The bedroom area itself, is  it's own private wing. Featuring a king size pillow top bed, desk, decorative fireplaces, a private entry to second floor veranda and an incredible one of a kind art collection (*note signed lithograph of Picasso's " The Lovers", which hangs over the king sized bed.) The Private columned bathroom suite, is " over the top"! Complete with a jacuzzi tub for two,and a marbled and glass multi head rain shower. Double vanities and a WC complete the suite. And of course, youâ€™re only a short walk to the pool and spa in the rear garden. PLEASE READ GUEST ACCESS BELOW FOR POOL /SPA RULES.

more description: The Pearl is a gorgeous, brand new condo located in one of the most convenient Pensacola locations.  You will be close to shopping, dining and just  25 minutes from some of the most amazing beaches in the state, including Gulf Breeze and Pensacola Beach. The emerald-green waters, along with the warm temperatures, make it a perfect place for a relaxing day on the sand. And if you'd like to take a break from the tourists,  you have an amazing community pool at your convenience.The spaceThere is just one way in and one way out of this brand new community, which makes for less through traffic. Only guests or residents will be in the area. It's a wonderful neighborhood for getting out and taking a stroll after dinner. The community pool is a 1 minute walk which has plenty of lounge chairs and umbrellas.

more description: Darling Downtown Delight is named for exactly what it is--Darling and Delightful in the great downtown area of Pensacola! You'll love this precious little cottage and we've tried to add all the touches of home so you'll be relaxed and enjoying everything about your stay! The bright blue door welcomes you, and as you enter you'll see the home has a fully equipped kitchen, living room, 2 bedrooms, and 2 full bathrooms. Our master has a king bed, and the second bedroom has full over full bunks.The spaceWe've made this space calming and clean, so you can relax to the max! The kitchen has all the appliances you need, and is stocked with basics so you can cook for your crew. The dining table seats four, but feel free to use the outdoor table and chairs also if the weather permits. The master bedroom has a king size bed, and the guest room has a full over full bunk bed set. The living room also has a couch that could sleep one person.

more description: Welcome to the Beach House...  Though not on the beach, this home is inspired by our local area which is well known for our soft sand beaches.  There is a nearby park for the kiddos, a kayak launch, fishing pier, boat launches, etc.  Pensacola NAS is also just a short drive from the home.  We hope you enjoy your stay with us. more description:
The spaceChrissy's Heavenly CottageYou'll be glad you booked a trip to Florida when you first step into this charming cottage! This home is conveniently placed by the local airport, downtown Pensacola, and the perfect white sands of Pensacola Beach! For a good time, you can head on to the city's many historic/cultural sites, and even the Maritime Park stadium, home to the town's very own team,  the Blue Wahoos!

Stroll on through the front door and be welcomed by your new home away from home, complete with a full kitchen with stainless steel appliances, gorgeous decor, central AC, and a TV in the living space. Check out the backyard for a gas grill if you're up to some tasty grilling for you and your guests, and end the night chatting away by the firepit and keeping warm! A private patio awaits you on the side of the duplex. You won't want to miss this vacation rental!

THINGS TO KNOW
Fireplace is only decorative. No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 4 vehicles. Parking is permitted in the front white pea gravel area in front of fence. Three (3) cars or (4) compact cars on an angle will fit very comfortably. Street parking is also permitted in the community.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description: Relax in this beautifully remodeled and decorated two bedroom bungalow. Located in the esteemed neighborhood of East Hill. This quiet neighborhood offers relaxation and enjoyment without the commotion. Minutes from the beach downtown Pensacola, shopping, and restaurants. Come sip some southern sweet tea on the front porch or curl up on the couch with that favorite summer book when your not enjoying all that wonders that Pensacola has to offer.  If relaxation is what you need. Come be our guest.The spaceThis adorable little craftsman has everything you could want for a nice relaxing vacation. Smart tv's in the living room and both bedrooms with internet and cable. Their is a washer and dryer for your convenience, a full kitchen with everything you need to create your favorite meals. Large back yard perfect for that morning coffee, and some bird watching, and then the beautiful and comfy front porch that seems like it was made for southern relaxation.

more description: The vintage decor of this bedroom is peppered with my grandmother's antiques and inspired by the beach. It is bright, clean, and has the best bed in the house. The rest of my home is decorated with Mid Century Modern furniture, complete with a shared spa-inspired bathroom. The house is cozy, clean, and full of light from the large windows that overlook the two acres and a pond. The yard is private and peaceful, with plenty of places to relax.The spaceJustin and I are artists and professors at the nearby college. We are professional, quiet, and gone most all day. We invite responsible working professionals to share our lovely house and outdoor spaces.You have full access to the well-appointed kitchen, you will have a shelf for dry goods and a shelf in the refrigerator. We invite you to use our spices and condiments.This is a wonderful place for those who truly enjoy quiet downtime and the outdoors. We have a large deck to enjoy the view of a woodsy yard and pond. Feel free to start a fire in the large fire pit outside!The small pond offers a delight of wildlife to enjoy, birds, frogs, turtles, wild duck, snakes (yes--be careful), and beaver! The beaver will often come out at night and will swim with the pedal boat, should you be out on the pond.

more description: Private guest suite in the heart of Historic Downtown Pensacola. No shared space with host.  Within 5 minute walking distance to Palafox St, the Ferry,  bay,  Ballpark, festivals, restaurants, art, museums and shopping!I strive to keep my space clean and affordable because I know how expensive travel can be. 74$ for 1 Guest, 84$ for 2! Rent from a LOCAL resident who lives here...NOT an investor. Quiet residential street close enough to enjoy the fun but far enough away to feel like home.The spacePrivate suite with private entrance locked away from the rest of the house. No shared inside space with me.  The room is cozy and modern with everything you need for a relaxing and easy getaway.  Neighborhood is quiet, safe and walkable with lots of beautiful historic homes. Close to everything even if walking, use the Veo scooters, or use my bikes!

more description: Charming 3 bedroom, 2 bath house with a private pool within 5 minutes of the beach!  This newly updated home not only ensures you have a super comfy place to stay during your Pensacola adventures but also spoils you with your own private salt water pool to relax in!  The house boasts a covered patio off the back of the house with a bar, TV and BBQ for additional outdoor fun. Average pool temp in winter months 78-84 degrees. In abnormally cold weeks, the pool temp may be a lower.The spaceThis charming open floor plan home has all new carpet in the bedrooms, a spacious master bedroom with en suite bath, and two additional bedrooms with shared bathroom. All bedrooms have their own TV. Guests will have access to the in house laundry room complete with iron and ironing board. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped if you choose to prepare your own meals. The dining area has a long solid wood table with benches to ensure there is plenty of room for all your family.Smart TVs are provided. Guests must log into their own streaming services for viewing. TVs are set up in guest mode which facilitates easy log in and log out for guests.

more description: Stunning spacious townhome, just a short walk to the soft and white sandy beach and emerald green waters of the Perdido Key island. It's located in the Lost Key Golf and Beach Resort. This is a hidden gem of the Florida panhandle for a serene beach getaway with best amenities, a Championship 18-hole Arnold Palmer golf course, lighted tennis courts, two resort style pools, hot spa, fitness center, and a Beach Club with complimentary beach chairs & umbrellas and private beachfront access!The spaceWelcome to Lost Key Paradise! This luxurious new townhome (1,500 SF) is perfect for a romantic getaway or family vacation. On the sleeping level, it features 2 bedrooms with extremely comfortable beds (1 king size master and 1 queen size guest, each with its own en-suite) as well as a laundry room with full size washer and dryer.  On the living level it features a fully equipped kitchen with an island and seating,  large dining table and living area with huge TV, desk area, sofa sleeper which can accommodate 2 additional guests (for a total of 6 guests), and a screened-in balcony and a back patio with sand dunes views for an early morning coffee or a romantic late nightcap. The office area has a huge desk with a monitor and a printer added for people working remotely.  WiFi and AT&T Premium TV Service with all 150 channels and HBO movie channels, are provided for our guests enjoyment. Brand new Pack and Play and a high chair are provided. There are also beach toys, big tennis rackets and mini ping-pong table set in the garage.  Comfortable outdoor chairs, a swing, a hammock, and a chaise lounge for ultimate relaxation on the back patio overlooking the sand dunes nature preserve.

more description: Ready for a unique AirBnB? Here in our cozy Airstream camper you can enjoy glamping at its finest, while still being in the heart of everything Pensacola has to offer.   Whether its a trip to some of the gulf coast's best beaches (15 min to Pensacola beach) or a stroll through downtown (<5 min), this location has you covered. Purchased & named after our late Uncle who believed in being excellent, even in the smallest ways, we hope that â€œChristopher's Cribâ€ can be exactly that for you.The space-Our 20â€™ Airstream Flying Cloud provides the iconic vintage look, but with all the modern conveniences you expect in a home today. -Includes a main bed surrounded by panoramic windows that have shades & sliding curtains for additional privacy. -The dinette converts into a second bed when easily lifted and lowered.-In the fridge you will find complimentary water and next to the Keurig you will find that coffee and tea are also provided.  -Veo electric scooters available onsite for quick access to downtown -There is a Roku TV included with access to streaming favorites like Hulu, Netflix and Disney+ (no cable).  -Enjoy some 90s gaming with a Sega Genesis preloaded with all the most popular games.***Private outdoor space with gazebo and lounge area***   This fenced area is completely separate from the main house, providing additional space for you to relax in.  Perfect for hanging out with friends and family.

more description: Beautiful, themed artist home located just 7 minutes from Downtown Palafox. 20 minutes from NAS Pensacola, quick access to the route to Pensacola Beach. This property is located in an old, diverse downtown neighborhood that is rapidly changing with new homes and remodeled ones appearing everywhere. This is a clean and comfortable, pet friendly house with fully equipped kitchen, WIFI, smart TVs with Netflix, Amazon, and commercial free YouTube, and more.The space"Casa Catrina: is owned by an award winning photographer who, through the use of his own photography as well as amazing art acquired and brought in from Mexico City over the last decade,  provides guests with a  colorful glimpse into the tradition of Dia de Los Muertos (Day of the Dead.) The home's interior is styled in "Mexican Farmhouse: and provides a fun and interesting living space that promotes an ambiance of color, simplicity, and simple elegance.The home's kitchen is well appointed with gas stove, modern appliances,  and nook for large group dining, as well as a counter height bar and three stools.There are three bedrooms that sleep a maximum of six individuals. Two full bathrooms, a back patio,  and a laundry room with washer/dryer are also available,The home is in the North downtown area and 7 minute drive from the Palafox street galleries, restaurants, and bars.  It also provides quick access for the route over three mile bridge to Gulf Breeze and Santa Rosa Island for those guests wishing to enjoy the best beaches in the USA.   This is a great choice for people who enjoy unique trendy spaces and interesting art, and wish to be close to the downtown action at an affordable price.

more description: Ask us about long stay discounts!This unique place has a style all it's own. Bohimian themed, filled with plenty of pillows and poufs, 5 miles from the beach, and perfect for a travel nurse, business professionals, or military stays with quick trips to the beach!The spaceThis beautiful and relaxing townhome in Gulf Breeze is perfect for exploring from Pensacola all the way to Navarre!With two memory foam roll-away beds, this unit comfortably sleeps 6. It's a perfect location to have easy access to any and everything that is the Emerald Coast: parks, shopping, local seafood & of course the beach! This unit is brand new with stainless appliances with an easy breezy feel. Only 5 miles from Pensacola beach and if you want to really explore the coast line, you're 25 minutes from Navarre beach if you travel the other direction!This townhome is all on one level so access is simple with no stairs. Clean linens plus extra are available as well as any other amenities you can think of: electric tea kettle with herbal teas, coffee maker and starter coffee/decaf/sugar provided, a 42" television & free Wifi, starter shampoo/conditioner/bodywash and fresh towels are waiting for you in each bathroom. No smoking in the unit (if smoke odor is detected by our teams upon departure an additional $125 per night will be billed to you). Thank you in advance.No parties. Some phenomenal attractions close by are:Fort PickensGulf Breeze ZooNaval Aviation MuseumPensacola BeachShoreline ParkOpal BeachNaval Live Oaks Natures Preserve Gulf Breeze Splash ParkNavarre Beach

more description: Unwind at your favorite resturant or bar, just a short walk to Palafox Street! Watch the sunrise while you relax with a cup of coffee on the balcony. Great view of the fireworks after a Blue Wahooâ€™s game. There are board and card games located in the fireplace for a quite night in with your family and friends. Pensacola Beach and NAS Pensacola are a short drive away (10-15 mins). Short walk to a local park and Bruce Beach. Dont know where to eat? Message us, we love to provide recommendations!The spaceWi-Fi throughout with Smart TVs located in the living room and in each bedroom. Each bedroom has a queen-sized bed. Each bathroom has a hair dryer, hand soap, bodywash, shampoo and conditioner. The kitchen is fully stocked and includes coffee and tea. There is a drop leaf table that has seating for 6. The living room has a fireplace and a 65in Smart TV. Board games are located in the cabinet on the fireplace. There is a washer and dryer in the house that is free and laundry soap is provided. In the laundry there are extra towels and beach towels as well. The yard is fully fenced and a gate on Main St. and one located in the back for the driveway. Parking accommodates two cars. There is a porch on the front of the home and a balcony off of the master suite.

description: Another Day in Paradise!
name: Condo in Florida
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted byÂ Liliana6 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 4 beds Â·  Â· 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 4 beds Â· **__** Â· 2.5 baths**__**Joined in June 2019**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Spend days & nights in this tastefully decorated 2 bedroom, 2.5  bath condo. in the best resort in Pensacola beach. Enjoy breathless views of the Santa Rosa bay from every room.  Spend the day at the beach or enjoy the many amenities the resort has to offer. Tennis, workout at gym, sauna, steam room, jacuzzi. Have a bbq on the terrace with your favorite drink and see amazing sunsets. The memories that you'll create are priceless! Life is short, enjoy every moment. See you soon in paradise!The spacePensacola beach is on the emerald-colored waters of the Gulf of Mexico. It is rated number 4 on the list of top best beaches in the United States!! The resort has a private beach for guests only. I offer a 2% weekly discount and a 3% monthly discount on the nightly rate and 3% for military personnel and first responders with proof. Portofino resort has a one-time check-in fee of $75.00 and a $10/nightly fee ( for entire group) in the winter, $15 in the Spring and $20 in the Summer and $10 in Fall for amenities. Escambia county requires that all hosts collect and remit a 5% local tax. This will be done via the Airbb resolution center. Itâ€™s not collected at check in. This gorgeous unit is in the newest tower of Portofino. It boasts breathtaking views of the Santa Rosa Sound from all rooms. It is completely renovated with a new kitchen, updated private en-suite bathrooms in both bedrooms and a Jacuzzi in the master bathroom.  Itâ€™s tastefully decorated. You will feel right at your home by beach. This incredible condo. is a true vacationerâ€™s dream! It has a king-size bed in the master bedroom, a queen-size bed in the guest bedroom. There is also a rolling sturdy single cot as a third bed in addition to a queen-size sofa bed in the living room.  My unit accommodates up to 6 guests comfortably. The amenities in the resort are endless (some not included in the price). There is an adventure park, a state-of-the-art fitness facility overlooking the bay, tennis courts, heated pools etc.. I cannot name them all!  Make a splash in one of the multiple infinity pools, or hot tubs, rent bicycles, and minicars.  At the end of your day enjoy a massage in the spa that will take your stress away (price not included). There is a resort concierge that can provide you with additional information on activities you can purchase & recommendations of restaurants/bars. Also to help you explore the area, I have a tourist guide on my page. There is plenty of free outdoor parking for your convenience. Check-in is at 4:00 PM and Check-out is at 10:00 AM. Be sure to enjoy Portofino al Fresco offering a variety of delicious cuisines and great drinks to satisfy every palate. Sip on your  favorite Starbucks coffee or snack at the Market at Portofino or opt for dine-in delivery and enjoy your meals in the comfort of the condo.. You can also choose to have a cookout on the private terrace that has an electric grill. The area also offers great restaurants! You will have a wonderful vacation at the Portofino resort and spa. See you in Paradise!Liliana

more description: Only steps from the sugar white sand beach. 5 minute drive (or walk along the beach) to Pensacola Beach Gulf Pier and Boardwalk. Upscale, two story unit with unobstructed spectacular views of the Gulf. Two balconies overlooking Gulf from living room and master bedroom. Guest bedroom features a queen bed and bunk bed, with a private shower. Both bedrooms have custom closets. Cable TV and Wifi. Elevator, pool, and 2 covered parking spaces.The spaceLocated on Santa Rosa Barrier Island with both Pensacola Bay and the Gulf white sand beach right outside the door.  Less than a mile to the famous Peg Leg Peter's restaurant, 2 miles to the main business area including Pensacola Beach Gulf Pier and Boardwalk with restaurants and entertainment.   6 miles to historic Fort Pickens along the beach.  Pensacola is home to U.S. Navy Blue Angels.    If you do not feel like driving, there is a beach trolley bus stop across the street with free service provided by the Santa Rosa Island Authority.  Please check their website for schedule.  This place is near surfing, scuba diving, fishing, golf, bicycle/hiking trails, blue angel air show, and year-round Pensacola fests.  Fully equipped kitchen, memory foam mattresses, all bed linens, bath & beach towels and chairs. Wonderful sunsets. This unit is comfortable for 6 adults. No pets are allowed in the complex.

more description: This eco-friendly cottage hosts a peaceful Gulf Coast theme on a quiet street, just blocks away from all the action. Located on the edge of downtown, you're never too far away from all Pensacola has to offer, and a quick jaunt to Pensacola or Perdido Beach. This home offers Excellent access to Wahoos Stadium, Sanders Beach, The Oar House, Pensacola Yacht Club, Pensacola Country Club, Joe Patti's, and Pensacola's Naval Air Station.The spaceThis cottage opens to a large entertaining area. Perfect for recharging after a long day at the beach or cooking with fresh seafood from Joe Patti's. The home offers WiFi with Smart Televisions in the living area and bedroom. The private bedroom features a California King mattress, access to the included washer and dryer, and access to the private bathroom, which offers a large, walk-in shower. A private paved patio in the rear is the perfect place to barbeque on the provided grill or relax while catching up on some reading.

description: "Seaclusion" Come Stargaze by the Beach!
name: Home in Gulf Breeze
unit rental details: Entire home hosted byÂ Kenny6 guests Â·  Â· 3 bedrooms Â·  Â· 3 beds Â·  Â· 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 3 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 3 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in August 2017**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Kick back & relax in this quiet, stylish space with incredible views of the Real Florida. Nestled perfectly at the end of the road, this home offers the comforts & amenities of home - in close proximity to a boat ramp on the intercostal & Florida's most beautiful beaches. Hike, bike, or paddle your way around near this peaceful escape, or stay in for the day & curl up to a book on the ultra-private back deck while taking in views of the greenbelt. Book now to come chill, grill or enjoy a thrill!The spaceRight between paradise and paradise, the pictures truly DO NOT do this peaceful home away from home justice.Not only is this place immaculate and like new inside, itâ€™s in a location that puts you only a short drive from Navarre Beach (11 miles) or Pensacola Beach (12 miles), a slightly longer, but still reasonable distance from Destin, and also near Downtown Pensacola night life, dining, shopping and sports. This cozy, well appointed home has a spacious feel, and comes equipped with all the comforts of home and luxuries of somewhere special! Stroll out back youâ€™ll find peace and tranquillity 24/7 and you see nothing but the beauty of nature while you feel the gentle bay breeze and hear the sounds of birds singing. You'll get an enchanted feeling as you hear the gentle song of the wind chimes out back as well. At night you can stargaze over the gorgeous Florida wetlands and you will feel youâ€™re the only person around for miles. Grill steaks, seafood, and veggies, or gather around the fire pit on the cooler nights after a long day on the beach or boating. In the garage youâ€™ll find classic arcade consoles that will feel like you warped to the 80s or 90s. Thereâ€™s also a nice metal detector if you want to try your hand at finding treasure on the nearby Woodlawn Beach boat ramp area or out on the island.1 King, 2 queens gives space for 6 or more comfortably and you can rest assured that everything has been throughly cleaned and sanitized. Here's a few things you won't find at all properties:1. All beds, pillows and bedding are new with allergen mattress protectors, pillow protectors and bedding is always sanitized and washed. 2. We offer a couple of complimentary bikes (for around the neighborhood) and SUPs/kayaks if you have a way to safely and carefully transport. Additional for rent at very low rates. 3. Nice quiet neighborhood and private end of the road property. 4. Bay/Boat ramp very close by!5. Movies, board games, arcade machines, foosball and basketball shooting game.6. We have about everything you'd have at home and would need for a fun and unforgettable beach trip!7. Host lives within 3 miles if you need anything at all.8. Did I mentioned we were super close the some of the World's Most Beautiful Beaches!?

This newly updated home not only ensures you have a super comfy place to stay during your Pensacola adventures but also spoils you with your own private salt water pool to relax in!  The house boasts a covered patio off the back of the house with a bar, TV and BBQ for additional outdoor fun. Average pool temp in winter months 78-84 degrees. In abnormally cold weeks, the pool temp may be a lower.The spaceThis charming open floor plan home has all new carpet in the bedrooms, a spacious master bedroom with en suite bath, and two additional bedrooms with shared bathroom. All bedrooms have their own TV. Guests will have access to the in house laundry room complete with iron and ironing board. The spacious kitchen is fully equipped if you choose to prepare your own meals. The dining area has a long solid wood table with benches to ensure there is plenty of room for all your family.Smart TVs are provided. Guests must log into their own streaming services for viewing. TVs are set up in guest mode which facilitates easy log in and log out for guests.

more description: Cozy Beach themed get away. Private room with shared common areas. Enjoy a 24 hour self check in (code provided for door). Room includes a door with lock+key to secure your items. Close drive to Pensacola Beach, Perdio key, Naval Airstation, and Cory Field Station. Short distance from aviation museum and downtown Pensacola. Convenient location, less than 30 minutes from everything Pensacola has to offer. Coffee & Espresso provided for free. Backyard use, many guests enjoy bonfires here.Other things to noteGuest please be aware of the following: This listing is for a private room in a single family home with shared common areas. You may encounter other guests. Medical cannabis is legal in the state of  Florida. Guests are welcome to use these products outside only.Also, this is Florida. An occasional insect in the home is not uncommon here because of the climate. I know this is not as common in other areas. We strive to keep the space clean and safe for you.

Keurig and coffee supplies, laundry and dish detergent supplied. Small dogs under 20lbs allowed for free; please check with hosts before booking. This home is centrally located 5 miles to downtown,  3 to NAS, 14 to Pensacola Beach, and 10 to Perdido Key.  Smoking not permitted. Check in 4pm,check out 10am. Early check in may be possible upon request.The spaceEnjoy staying close to downtown Pensacola and only minutes to Perdido Key and Pensacola Beach. Eclectic Navy Point is across the street where you can find a community beach, walking trail, playground and boat ramp. For active duty military, retirees and DOD, the Naval Base is only 5 minutes away which has its own beaches, golf course, lighthouse, movie theater and so much more. Bring your family and book  both units or enjoy a couples getaway.

more description: Recently renovated Larkspur Landing is conveniently located for all your needs during your Pensacola area stay, whether youâ€™re visiting for business or pleasure. This comfy oasis, located near the I-10, is just minutes away from the beach, naval base, colleges & universities, shopping, dining and many other local attractions. Far enough away from busy tourist spots, but close enough for all the regionâ€™s amenities, it is the perfect place to relax and to stage for whatever your day may bring.The spaceThis comfy getaway is located on a quiet street in a residential neighborhood. Guests have access to the entire house and the fully stocked kitchen. This location can accommodate 9 guests with four bedrooms and two baths. The large backyard allows for time to enjoy the beautiful weather and an outdoor meal, or you can put your feet up next to the firepit on cooler evenings. For those on vacation, this home can accommodate friends and family of all ages and the outdoor area and indoor game room, featuring ping pong and pool tables, allows for multiple activities for everyone to enjoy.  For those visiting for work, there are dedicated workspaces and high-speed internet. You can quickly plug in and go to get your workday started. more description:
The spaceWisteria Escape - East HillEscape to the Florida Panhandle at this two-story, central Pensacola townhome, conveniently located within walking distance of Alga Brewery, two blocks to a taco truck, East Hill park, and a Publix. Enjoy all of the local food East Hill has to offer, from the Brown Bagger to East Hill Pizza, or enjoy morning coffee at Magnolia. You're also just one mile from the boat launch - bring your own boat and explore the open waters!

This bright, tastefully-decorated home features a great room with a well-equipped, full kitchen with stainless steel appliances and an island with counter seating for four alongside a sunlit living area with a plush sectional sofa, gas fireplace, smart TV, and doors that open out to the back patio, pool, and yard.

Outside, fire up the gas grill for warm weather barbecues or take a refreshing dip in your private, optionally-heated pool. You'll also find a propane firepit and a TV making this a great space for entertaining and evening cocktails.

WHATâ€™S NEARBY
This home is set a few blocks from the Pensacola Bay waterfront. Cruise under 10 miles to Pensacola Beach, plus the Pensacola Bay Center is just half a mile from the home and offers concerts and other events. The Pensacola Children's Museum is one mile away and offers fun in the sun.

THINGS TO KNOW1 dog(s), weighing 40lbs or less, are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 3 vehicles. The driveway can accommodate two vehicles; you may also store a boat on the driveway. Street parking is allowed. Security camera details: door bell and flood light over garage1 days notification is required in order to heat the pool. A fee of USD32 per day must be paid prior to check-in. Guests can contact Vacasa after booking to purchase pool heat for your stay.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. more description:
Welcome to The Carriage House. Escape to this one-bedroom, one-bath getaway located minutes from Downtown Pensacola. The inground pool, patio, grill, and bikes make your stay worthwhile. A pull-out sofa bed is located in the living room, making this house comfortable for up to four guests.

The Carriage House is proudly managed by Hometown Properties of the Gulf Coast in Pensacola, FL - find us @RentPensacolaHomes.The spaceThe Property -
Primary Bedroom: Queen-Sized Bed with Smart TV for streaming;
Living Room: Pull-out Bed Sofa, 2-Recliners, SmartTV for streaming;
Kitchen: Refrigerator, Electric Stove, Dishwasher, Over-the-range Microwave, Toaster, Coffee Maker, and Blender;
Washer & Dryer

ADDITIONAL DETAILS
Two bicycles
Free High-speed wireless internet
Streaming TVs, remember to bring your personal logins to your favorite streaming services.
Linens & towels are provided. Please bring your own beach towels
Hairdryer available
Coffee: We provide a starter amount of coffee
A variety of small kitchen appliances, including a toaster and blender, plus pots and pans
Household essentials â€“ â€œstarter packâ€ of laundry detergent, dishwashing detergent, trash bags, paper towels, toilet paper, and travel-sized shampoo, conditioner, and soap per bathroom. (typically enough for a 2-night stay)

EXTRAS:
Olive Oil, Salt/Pepper, and a few spices
Baking Sheets, Mixing Bowls, Dinnerware
We do not provide beach equipment â€“ beach towels, beach chairs, cooler, beach umbrella - be sure to bring your own.

POLICIES:
A full list of our rules and regulations is contained in our Rental Agreement, which will be emailed to you for electronic signature after booking. *Your booking is not complete until the Rental Agreement has been signed. *

TRASH/SANITATION: Please take the trash and recycling to the cans at the curb for pick up on Tuesday mornings. Thank you for helping keep our property clean and sanitary for future guests.

Brand New Construction w/2 Master Suites 2 Master Bathrooms & Patios, 2 Youth Rooms with Full Bathroom + Guest bathroom. WIFI, Air Fryer, Bikes, Beach Chairs/Towels, XBOX, Pop A Shot Basketball, Cornhole, BBQ Grill, 5 Large Flat Screen Smart TV's, Community Pool, Pickleball Courts, Harbor & Bocce Ball Makes this the Perfect Home!The spaceThis home is ideal for two families to vacation together or one large family. The first youth bedroom features 2 twin bunkbeds and the second youth bedroom features 2 twin day beds with trundles. All  Bedrooms & the Living Room Feature Large Smart Tv's. In the garage you will find beach toys, two beach chairs, beach towels, a baby walker, basketball arcade shooting machine & child's scooter with helmet. In the backyard you will find the back patio with seating, BBQ Grill, Cornhole + The backyard is fenced in with a Privacy Fence! Make your family vacation special today!

number of guests: 10 guests Â· **__** Â· 3 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 11 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in May 2018**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description:
The Wandering Turtle, conveniently located midway between Destin & Pensacola, offers a perfect vacation experience for kids and adults alike. The backyard oasis boasts a large inground pool and cabana. The owners have thought of everything to make this space both extremely kid-friendly, yet romantic for the adults. With its ideal setting just across the bridge from the beach, you'll be able to avoid most of the traffic on Hwy. 98.  Come enjoy this home thoughtfully designed with next-level care!The spaceLiving Spaces

As you enter the front hall with its gleaming hardwood floors, and thoughtful side tables for keys, wallets, and purses, the first thing youâ€™ll notice is living spaces that manage to be both stylish and luxurious, while still maintaining an inviting and family-friendly atmosphere. 

The cozy living room is found adjacent to the generous, family-sized kitchen. Its decor is Beachy Luxe - a delightful combination of soothing neutral shades, with bright pops of complementary colors and decor. 

Sink into either the L-shaped sofa or one of the two cozy side chairs. Perhaps youâ€™ll want to stream your favorite shows or movies on the Smart TV w/high-speed WiFi. If not, curl up with a good book. Or maybe challenge a family member to one of the many board games, or even try your hand at a puzzle. 

If this is a working vacation, take advantage of our dedicated work area with a chair, charging station, and enough room for your printer. 

Additional Amenities:

Oversized Jenga
Oversized Connect 4
Oversized family dice game
Multiple puzzles and board games
Florida-opoly (similar to Monopoly)
Cards
Preschool puzzles
Childrenâ€™s books and toys
Portable Bluetooth speaker
Essential oil diffuser
Air Ionizer

Cooking & Dining

The gorgeous kitchen will no doubt tempt even the most reluctant chef! This ultra-modern space features all the amenities youâ€™ve come to expect in a luxury home. From stainless steel appliances to solid-surface countertops, to pendant lighting, to a long kitchen island with seating for 4, this fully-equipped kitchen has everything you might need to create even the most demanding and intricate recipes. 

The formal dining room is elegant and inviting, with a timeless sideboard displayed neatly against the wall, a beautiful chandelier tucked into the trayed ceiling and coastal artwork on the walls. Not only will it be a pleasure to dine in style here, it may even inspire you to create a new family tradition of dining together with conversation and laughter instead of electronic devices. 

Other kitchen/dining amenities include: 

Bread maker
Rice maker
Instapot
Wok
Griddle
Pampered Chef popcorn maker
Large bowls
Kids cups/sippy cups
Pizza cutter
Keurig w/starter set of coffee pods and creamer
12-cup drip coffee maker (no coffee provided)
Hot water kettle
Assorted teas and sweetener
Kidsâ€™ dinnerware
Portable high chair
Starter set of garbage bags, paper towels, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher pods

Sleeping Accommodations and Bathrooms

The Wandering Turtle offers 3 bedrooms (each with a Smart TV) and accommodations for up to 10 guests. 

Taking advantage of a split bedroom plan, the master suite is at the other end of the home from the two other bedrooms. As parents ourselves, we wanted to create a â€œvacation within a vacationâ€ ambiance for this space. Itâ€™s been outfitted with a romantic 4-poster king-sized bed and a corner armchair with its own eclectic light and side table, perfect for reading or just relaxing. The artwork is colorful and cheerful. The big soaking tub in the master bath offers a pampering treat, which every parent so richly deserves! Other features in this spa-like space include dual vanities.  

The second bedroom is the childrenâ€™s lair, with its triple bunk bed (with 3 twin mattresses), and a truly innovative bean bag that opens up into a double bed (see how it works here). Now they can all pile up together for a vacation-long sleepover party!
This room also serves as the game room, with an old-style digital arcade, featuring more than 399 games. You may never see the kids at all during vacation.

The third bedroom has a double bed with a twin trundle. A distinctive mermaid mural makes this a uniquely styled sanctuary. When youâ€™ve finished watching the Smart TV or listening to your favorite tunes on Alexa, youâ€™ll feel like youâ€™re drifting off to sleep in an underwater retreat. 

The second and third bedrooms share a full hall bath with a tub/shower.

Additional Amenities for Beds/Baths:

Extra towels, linens, pillows, blankets 
Baby monitor
Personal fans for bunk beds
Shampoo, conditioner, body wash
Hair dryer
Starter set of toilet paper

Outdoor Amenities

This backyard oasis was built for family fun and memory-making. Just steps out the back door is the large free-form pool, with a shallow toddler area and a fun tiki umbrella. In case the kids want to stay on dry land, thereâ€™s still plenty of fun to be had! Thereâ€™s a playhouse to explore and a big, fenced yard to exhaust themselves in.  

Interested in a lazy day lounging around the pool? Thereâ€™s no better way to do that than relaxing in the covered cabana, complete with a cozy chaise lounge for two. 

Enjoy your meals al fresco at the outdoor dining table for 6, while enjoying the freshly grilled fish (or good olâ€™ burgers and dogs) from the gas grill. 

Additional Amenities:

Starter set of swim diapers for smaller kids
Firepit starter set of wood and lighter
Floats for pool
Backpack cooler
Small cooler
Beach chairs
Large family-size sheet to sit on the beach
Sand toys 
Beach towels

more description: Sweet on Strong Street - Unit A is centrally located with easy access to everything Pensacola has to offer! This 1 bedroom, 2 bathroom property is less than a mile from downtown and is just a short drive to the Pensacola International Airport and Naval Air Station Pensacola. It is the perfect location for anyone looking to go out and explore!The spaceGuests will park and enter through the back door. As you step inside, you will find yourself in the kitchen and dining space. Our galley style kitchen maximizes the efficiency of the cook, you can get any meal whipped up in no time!  Off of the kitchen is the smartly appointed living space. It features a beautiful (decorative only!) fireplace, queen size sleeper sofa, and large SmartTV.The bedroom is fitted with a comfortable queen size bed and has an ensuite bathroom.  There is an additional full size bathroom just off the living room. This cozy space is perfect for a couple, small family, or business professional looking to spend some time in Pensacola!**Please note, this is a duplex and the front half of this house is also available to rent.**

more description: The Bayfront Manor brings the best of both worlds to your vacation or business stay in Pensacola.  Located 5 min walk from historic downtown, Seville Square, and Palafox Street, the location is ideal for all dining, nightlife, and events.  The home is positioned on the corner of Bayfront Dr allowing for great water views of Pensacola Bay.  The best beaches on the Gulf are only a 10 min drive. The location is also great for wedding parties as the Barkley House and Christ Church are walkable.The spaceThe well appointed home is fully accessible to all guests. Built in 2014, the home has all new, modern appliances, a huge chef style kitchen, luxury furniture, spacious bedrooms with patios and great views. The front porch is a great place to wind down the day. Special amenities include a fireplace, wine fridge, Playstation 4, Weber grill, sitting library, large dining table, beach equipment, and 2 bikes. Welcome home!

more description: Offering unparalleled comfort and convenience, this vacation home is sure to exceed all of your expectations! Situated near Pensacola Beach(7 min), this home offers something for everyone. Spend your day lounging on the sugar white sands or explore the areas history with a visit to Fort Pickens or the Pensacola Lighthouse. Enjoy many of the areas best local eats and return to enjoy quality furniture, a fully equipped kitchen and an evening around the firepit as you unwind with loved ones.The spaceThis home is a 2 bedroom, 1 bath duplex. The main bedroom has a queen bed and the additional bedroom has 2 twin beds. The living room has a comfortable sofa that pulls out into a full size sleeper. There is plenty of room for 6 in this home. We are family friendly & pet friendly.  We have provided beach towels, sand toys, a couple chairs as well as baby essentials like a pack n play, toys and a high chair. The kitchen is fully stocked and also includes plastic ware for the kiddos! The back yard is green and welcoming with the right amount of sunshine and shade! Enjoy a relaxing morning coffee on the deck and enjoy evenings by the firepit.

This unit is in tower 1 an on the 13th floor!Every room in every Sky Home has a water view. No Sky Home sits below the fifth floor. Spacious and comfortable, each Sky Home is at least twice as wide as a typical beach condo. With private water-view balconies, each is equipped with all the conveniences you'd expect to find in a premier resort, including spacious closets with extra linens and pillows, as well as a dishwasher, washer/dryer and much more. Every room has its own full bathroom plus a half-bath for Sky Home common-area use. Each of Portofino's five Mediterranean-inspired towers features its own exclusive outdoor pool and revitalizing whirlpool spa, plus one covered parking spot for your convenience.Portofino offers many amenities such as a 40,000-square-foot, lifestyle center that includes state of the art fitness equipment including Cybex weight machines and True cardio equipment with individual LCD T/V. more description: Offering unparalleled comfort and convenience, this vacation home is sure to exceed all of your expectations! Situated near Pensacola Beach(7 min), this home offers something for everyone. Spend your day lounging on the sugar white sands or explore the areas history with a visit to Fort Pickens or the Pensacola Lighthouse. Enjoy many of the areas best local eats and return to enjoy quality furniture, a fully equipped kitchen and an evening around the firepit as you unwind with loved ones.The spaceThis home is a 2 bedroom, 1 bath duplex. The main bedroom has a queen bed and the additional bedroom has 2 twin beds. The living room has a comfortable sofa that pulls out into a full size sleeper. There is plenty of room for 6 in this home. We are family friendly & pet friendly.  We have provided beach towels, sand toys, a couple chairs as well as baby essentials like a pack n play, toys and a high chair. The kitchen is fully stocked and also includes plastic ware for the kiddos! The back yard is green and welcoming with the right amount of sunshine and shade! Enjoy a relaxing morning coffee on the deck and enjoy evenings by the firepit.

description: 2ndFL,OFP,SeasonalFreeChair&Umb.,HeatedPool,Arcade
name: Condo in Navarre
unit rental details: Entire condo hosted byÂ Brent6 guests Â·  Â· 1 bedroom Â·  Â· 4 beds Â·  Â· 1.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 1 bedroom Â· **__** Â· 4 beds Â· **__** Â· 1.5 baths**__**Joined in October 2018**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Complimentary Daily Beach Service: (SEASONAL)Includes two chairs, one umbrella.Available 7 days a week, March 1stâ€“Oct 31st (244 days annually)9: 00 am â€“ 5: 00 pm; Peak Season (Weather Permitting).The spaceWelcome to MalcoGetaways!We have added an ARCADE GAMING CONSOLE! With 300 games to choose from and 2 players! More to enjoy on your stay with us!!This beautiful condo is located on the second floor of The Inn at Summerwind.  There are three entire buildings to this complex, with yours directly situated beside the Gulf of Mexico's longest fishing pier. Upon arrival, you will enter the double glass doors right to the elevators.  Go up to the second floor, and as soon as you exit the elevator, you will see unit 203.Step into your condo and experience a Floridian getaway with beach-oriented decor and Oceanfront views. We have stocked the condo with 4k ultra HD smart TVs, a 65" curved one in the living room, and a 43" in the master bedroom.  Log In with your account and enjoy Netflix, Sling, Hulu, Prime Video, CH+, Vudu, and Youtube.  Cable and WiFi are provided.  You will have six pool passes that must be worn by each guest who plans to use the pool or hot tub amenities.  There is a double-chaise couch with a queen pull-out sofa, two 65" standing lamps, and a dining table with four chairs in the living room.This condo has a fully stocked kitchen with new granite countertops and three barstools. Bathrooms are semi-shared, meaning you will share the shower but nothing else.  We do include a hairdryer aside from amenities provided by the cleaning company.  Laundry is also located in the shower section.  The bathrooms have accessible toilet/sink space from the hall and another toilet/sink space accessible from the Master Bed.  Both of which you can close doors for privacy from the shower section, hall, and master bedroom.The Master bedroom has a king-sized bed with two nightstands and a tall dresser.  A closet in the bathroom and down the hall is where you will find the bunkbeds.From the balcony, enjoy the ease of communication with friends as they play at the pool or relax in the hot tub.  On the patio are chairs and a high table for dining outdoors.  Also, there is a double-seater bench with a glass table section for drinks.We have provided a beach wagon for your convenience to use during your stay.  Also, for your convenience, there is a grocery delivery service called Grocery Concierge.  This company will get your groceries and stock the condo for a fee.  You can research and find their website online by searching the name of the company.Provided for your enjoyment are 3 NICE POOL'S and 3 HOT TUB'S (only one is heated seasonally/this changes yearly on which pool is heated)â€”fully fenced in with sand for kids to play in, picnic tables, grills, gardens, and showers for coming from the beach.  You are allowed to use any pool or hot tub in the Summerwind Complex.  Each pool has a bathroom for your use as well. During your stay, enjoy what each building offers on level 1.  Each building has an info center on this level and a gym.  If you want snacks and drinks, the building furthest from the pier(west building)offers a little gift shop/bar.  You can access this from the parking lot or the pool area.  On the ground level, there are vending machines as well.There is a trash chute right beside the elevators.  When you exit the room, fire alarms are to each side of the hallway outside.  There are carts on-site at ground level for bringing luggage into the rooms.  You will find them located in the foyer of the entrance.  You can also pull under the carport if the weather is not ideal.We use a cleaning company that provides the needed amount of rags, towels, hand towels, and kitchen rags.  There will be dishwasher detergent, a bathroom shower mat for stepping out of the tub, hand soap, dish soap, paper towels, and toilet paper.  If you need more rags or towels, there is a washer and dryer in this unit.  These are travel-sized amenities, so think hotel.Amount Supplied are:-Eight towels-One shower mat-Four hand towels-Eight ragsFUN LOCAL RENTALS TO DO CLOSE BY - kayaks, paddleboards, jet skis, bicycles, scooters, pontoon boats, sailboat, parasailing, waterpark, fly the boat, dolphin tours, and craigcats! You are located right beside all of the food and drink locations for Navarre Beach.  Enjoy any of these Broussard's of Navarre Beach, Juana's Pagodas, Sailors Grill, Beach House Bar and Grille, Windjammer's on the pier, visit the fishing pier, and the gift shop of the pier.You have a gas station on Navarre Beach, but you will have to drive back across the bridge for shopping needs.  There you can find a Dollar Store, Wal-Mart, Publix, Winn Dixie, and a few tourist locations like Navarre Seafood Market, TC's Front Porch, Vine Wine Bar and Shop, Shark Bite Navarre, TOMMY'S SNOBALLS, and more!From your condo, you are:-20 min drive to Fort Walton-20 min drive to Pensacola Beach-47 min drive to Downtown Pensacola-15 min drive to Gulf Breeze Zoo-30 min drive to National SeashoreFees charged by me:- a cleaning fee of $135.00- refundable deposit of $100.00
