The sitting area off the foyer has soaring 20' ceilings showcasing beautiful white pine ceiling beams. A large back deck spans the back of the home showcasing a serene, private backyard with aged oak trees. Plenty of parking. With 4 bedrooms/2.5 baths there is plenty of room for families to vacation together. PLEASE read the house rules.The spaceThis home was designed in the 60s by the renowned architect, Hugh J. Leitch, in the Pensacola area as his own personal home. Large clerestory windows in the foyer and front sitting room supply ample natural light. The home boasts unique mid-century architecture and is now remodeled with contemporary artistic finishes.

more description: CAROLINE COTTAGE makes you feel good to be alive right about now.  Step up to the front porch, rock beside your favorite person, and enjoy the serene views of this peaceful Seville Historic Neighborhood in Downtown Pensacola.    The cottage and grounds is your exclusive space  - no shared spaces.  Explore all the goodness Downtown offers - restaurants, shops, parks, nightlife & museums within 5-10 minutes from Caroline Cottage by foot. Close enough for convenience, far enough for a restful stay. Similar to the size of a cabin it is 870 sq. ft. of Bliss:  Indoors, the high ceilings, and thoughtful details make this home friendly and elegant â€”ideal for weddings, family, or couples' vacations.  Private bedrooms separate from the living spaces make the cottage a great place to entertain company.The spaceTHE SPACE:  Caroline Cottage is a sentimental place named after its prior owner, Caroline Presti.  Although she never lived in it, Caroline loved this cottage, and I managed the property for her over the years as an annual rental (I am her son and biggest fan).  She was married for over 50 years to the love of her life, Joseph Presti, and she was happiest when they were together.  On the walls in the living area are a few snapshots of the couple early on in their sentimental journey.THE GREAT OUTDOORS:    This two-bedroom, one-bath single-story cottage is your private residence  with plenty of outdoor space. We all need a place to step outside, breathe in the fresh air, get a dose of Vitamin D and unwind. We gave our outside spaces and gardens a lot of love. Youâ€™ll particularly enjoy the exterior dining areas and porch rockers where you can relax for an evening sip on your favorite beverage or relax for a peaceful retreat.As your health and well-being are important, you will have immediate access to purified H2Oâ€”no need for bottled water. Under the kitchen sink is a Reverse Osmosis System (ROS, a water purification process) dispensed by a separate faucet beside the kitchen sink.CLEANLINESS:  We pride ourselves on our meticulous attention to detail â€” so you can trust we will fulfill the highest level of cleanliness. And, with well over 100 guest stays, our vacation cottages have an average cleaning review score of 5 stars. For those physical folks, enjoy your visit and stay fit with FREE access to the local gym, Anytime Fitness, for up to 4 guests (access fobs are onsite and permit two guests each).  It is a 24-hr gym, located 3 minutes by foot, complete with cardio equipment, free weights, and weight machines.  Starter provisions (generally enough for three days) include Keurig coffee pods, teas, condiments, treats, cleaning products, and detergent pods for the washer and dishwasher.  Longer stay visitors, please make yourselves at home, and you will most likely need to purchase additional provisions.  Enjoy your stay and be sure to visit the many sites and attractions afforded to you in this Historic Neighborhood.  Caroline Cottage was recently furnished and updated with New Washer/Dryer and Central AC/Heat.  It is one-story for easy accessibility and reduces the likelihood of falls.  Below are just a few of the things you will find at Caroline Cottage.â€¢	Open Living/Dining/Kitchen Areas â€¢	Live-Edge Dining Table with Benchâ€¢	Ceiling fans in Living Area and Both Bedroomsâ€¢	High-Speed WIFI (Up to 500 Mbps download)-â€¢	USB/Electrical outlets/Charging Stations in Bedrooms & Living Areaâ€¢	Robust Cable Television Channels (250+ channels)â€¢	Complete Kitchen for cooking* â€¢	Refrigerator and Freezer with Ice Makerâ€¢	Reverse Osmosis (Double filtration system for quality drinking water)â€¢	Coffee/Tea Station (Keurig System)â€¢	French Press, Grinder, Electric Kettle, Microwave, Toaster, Blenderâ€¢	Washer & Dryerâ€¢	Firm Memory Foam Mattressesâ€¢	Luggage Racksâ€¢	Egyptian Cotton Bed Linens (1200 Count)â€¢	Belgian Linen Duvet Coverâ€¢	Turkish Cotton Bath Towelsâ€¢	Linen Duvet and Down Comforterâ€¢	Outdoor Sitting Areas on Front & Back Porchâ€¢	Wireless LED Lampsâ€¢	Off-Street Parking*Kitchen Item Details:  Complete Kitchen for cooking:  Pots & Pans, Oven Mits, Cutting Boards, silverware, knives & utensils, dishes/bowls/plates, spatula, ladle, whisk, tongs, serving bowls, mixing bowls, strainers, wine/bottle opener, vegetable peeler, measuring cups, drying rack.Be sure to drop us a note or follow us @carolinecottagepensacola

name: Townhouse in Pensacola Beach
unit rental details: Entire townhouse hosted by VacasaÂ Florida6 guests Â·  Â· 2 bedrooms Â·  Â· 5 beds Â·  Â· 2.5 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 2 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 5 beds Â· **__** Â· 2.5 baths**__**Joined in January 2017**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description:
The spaceBoardwalk E1Direct beach access and a stunning bay view mean this townhouse is a fantastic beach retreat! Walk mere steps out to the beach, or kick back on the furnished deck overlooking the bay and take it all in. After a fun day on the beach, you can come back to watch a good movie or show on the living area's TV.

Mix a beverage or prepare a sumptuous meal in the trendy full kitchen. You'll have helpful extras like a microwave, a full-size coffee maker, and ample counter space, and you can serve your dinner guests at the dining room table with seating for four while the kids chatter away from the two breakfast bar stools. Each bedroom has a ceiling fan and private balcony, with the main bedroom also featuring a swing. Central air-conditioning will keep everyone cool inside. When you're ready for a new activity, guests can enjoy access to an outdoor pool right next door to the townhouse and an outdoor shower to help with going from the pool to the beach and back. A sofa bed in the living room offers extra sleeping space.

WHATâ€™S NEARBY
Public beach access on the Gulf side is just across the street, but that's just the beginning! The bay may be more suitable for families with small children. Gulf Island National Seashore offers sand castle-worthy sand just under six miles away to the northeast. Langdon Beach is just under six miles away to the west, set within the historical Fort Pickens attractions. If you're looking to get out onto the water, Jolly Sailing and Dolphin Cruise offers tours and cruises just over two miles away.

THINGS TO KNOW No dog(s) are welcome in this home. No other animals are allowed without specific Vacasa approval.Parking notes: There is free parking for 2 vehicles. There is room for two vehicles directly underneath E1. Additional parking can be found along the perimeter of the community. Parking passes will be located on the kitchen counter. Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.Damage waiver: The total cost of your reservation for this Property includes a damage waiver fee which covers you for up to $3,000 of accidental damage to the Property or its contents (such as furniture, fixtures, and appliances) as long as you report the incident to the host prior to checking out. More information can be found from the "Additional rules" on the checkout page.

more description: LOCATION. LUXURY. COMFORT. Located in beautiful Downtown Pensacola. Fabulous home with plenty amenities. Only 5 minutes to many popular attractions, restaurants, and shopping. Only 15 minutes from Pensacola Beach- a perfect location for both Downtown and Beach activities. Stretch out and relax. Make our home your home away from homeThe spaceBrand new townhome along with everything in it. Perfect for families looking to relax and enjoy Pensacolaâ€™s beautiful downtown area and beaches. This is a 3bed/2.5 bath home that sleeps 8 with two queen beds, 2 single beds, a sofa, and full size air mattress. The home offers a fully appointed kitchen with everything you need for your stay. The home is equipped with all new kitchen appliances, full dining sets and utensils, large dining room table for family style meals, 4K UHD TV, Netflix, large capacity washer/dryer and basic toiletries. We are close to everything! This home is well suited for large families, singles, or couples looking to relax and reconnect. This home is great for couples, families, wedding party, graduations, conferences, Military stays, and business travelers alike. Great for staying while you are getting ready to move into that new house, or house hunting. Stay a few nights, or an extended stay up to six weeks. Contact owner for more information on extended stays.

unit rental details: Entire home hosted byÂ Ron6 guests Â·  Â· 3 bedrooms Â·  Â· 4 beds Â·  Â· 2 baths
number of guests: 6 guests Â· **__** Â· 3 bedrooms Â· **__** Â· 4 beds Â· **__** Â· 2 baths**__**Joined in October 2015**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap**__**PrivacyÂ·**__**Â·TermsÂ·**__**Â·Sitemap
more description: Beautiful, themed artist home located just 7 minutes from Downtown Palafox. 20 minutes from NAS Pensacola, quick access to the route to Pensacola Beach. This property is located in an old, diverse downtown neighborhood that is rapidly changing with new homes and remodeled ones appearing everywhere. This is a clean and comfortable, pet friendly house with fully equipped kitchen, WIFI, smart TVs with Netflix, Amazon, and commercial free YouTube, and more.The space"Casa Catrina: is owned by an award winning photographer who, through the use of his own photography as well as amazing art acquired and brought in from Mexico City over the last decade,  provides guests with a  colorful glimpse into the tradition of Dia de Los Muertos (Day of the Dead.) The home's interior is styled in "Mexican Farmhouse: and provides a fun and interesting living space that promotes an ambiance of color, simplicity, and simple elegance.The home's kitchen is well appointed with gas stove, modern appliances,  and nook for large group dining, as well as a counter height bar and three stools.There are three bedrooms that sleep a maximum of six individuals. Two full bathrooms, a back patio,  and a laundry room with washer/dryer are also available,The home is in the North downtown area and 7 minute drive from the Palafox street galleries, restaurants, and bars.  It also provides quick access for the route over three mile bridge to Gulf Breeze and Santa Rosa Island for those guests wishing to enjoy the best beaches in the USA.   This is a great choice for people who enjoy unique trendy spaces and interesting art, and wish to be close to the downtown action at an affordable price.

more description: Charming, traditional and convenient. A quiet neighborhood and close to everything. A home with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 living rooms, and large kitchen. You will have the master bedroom / bathroom with an option to reserve a second bedroom that offers 1 queen and three twins. A back patio with gold fish pond, sitting area and BBQ grill for your use.  Hundreds of walking and biking trails nearby. Laundry, Wi-Fi, two bikes, and exercise equipment available for use. Your own parking spot.The spaceOlder home with upgrades. Lots of space for a traveling professional. A great space for someone that needs to spend more than a week in the area. Plenty of safe parking and extra storage in the garage. This is a family friendly neighborhood close access to downtown in one direction and close to the airport and shopping in the other direction.
